But if in a nocturnall geniture he be placed oppoſite to the giver of life (for ♃, rejoyceth not in nocturnall genitures) he diminiſheth 12. yeares of the natives age; but if in a nocturnall geniture, ♂, ♀, or the ☽ be oppoſite to him, they fill the native with many vices according to the nature and quallty of the ſignes: in humane ſignes they are libidinous exceſſive luſtfull and prepoſterouſly effeminate, in 4. footed ſignes, Hunters, Lovers of Wild-beaſts; frequent haunters of Woods and deſert places; and given to much labour: in earthly ſignes, herbariſts; deſirous to know more of the ſecrets of nature then is lawfull: in watry ſignes, fiſhers or ſuch as get their living about Rivers the Sea or watry places, truly laborious and alwayes living thereby.

But if ♃, be thus poſited by night, oppoſing theſe ſtars, and the ☽ ſeperating from him, he ſignifies an unconſtant life, ſubject to much unhappineſſe, but the
ſame is in ſome ſort mirigated, if the ☽ ſeperate from him and apply her ſelfe by a good Aſpect to ♀: but if the ☽, depart from him and go to ♂, with any ſtarre, it ſignifies much miſery and unhappineſſe.

But if ♃, be thus placed and the ☽ ſeparate from him, and apply to ♂, by a □, it denotes a violent death to the native according to the nature and quality of the ſignes; for if ♂ behold the ☽, with and ☍, ſo departed from ♃, in a nativity by night, it ſignifies wranglings, dangers, and ſtrife with inferiour people.
Wherefore Iupieer, in this ſigne by night commonly ſignifies calamities.

Iupiter, in the 6. houſe ſignifies much evill, if he be lord of the ſigne wherein the Horoſcope is or of the mid-Heaven, or behold the ☉, ♄, or ♂, by a □, or if he behold the ☽, decreaſing by a □; or the ☽, be decreaſing in the ſame ſigne: but if he be not afflicted by any evill ſtarre, and receive the light of the ☽, increaſing the evill is thereby mitigated, he ſignifies here ſouth-ſayers, embroyderers in Gold, Silver-Smithes, but nevertheleſſe, if they gaine any thing by theſe artes, they quickly ſpend it.

Iupiter, in the 7. houſe ſignifies wealth and long life in a nativity by day, but in nocturnall genitures, he generally ſignifies Wives and Children; for the native ſhall loſe a deare Wife, and ſee the miſerable death of a Son or a Daughter. But in old age he giveth increaſe of eſtate, nevertheleſſe but meane, and ſo much as he ſhall not want.

Jupiter, in the 8. houſe, commonly deſtroyes ones eſtate, raiſeth up a great many enemies, ſtirreth up ſeditions commonly among the people and malicious acts; he ſignifies the native to be ignoble, a proud fooliſh boaſter; full of prepoſterous animoſity, and mad raging folly; eſpecially if there be an evill ſtarre in any Angle of the geniture, but if he have ☿ with him, or in ▵, to him or the ☽ increaſing behold him with any good Aſpect, he ſignifies procurators or meſſengers of Kings; and the native alwayes to die in his youth.

Jupiter, in the 9. houſe by day ſignifies Prophets and Foretellers of things to come, interpreters of the Oracles of God, Preiſts, Churchmen, and ſomtimes he ſignifies loſſe or damage; in a nativity by night he ſignifies, dreamers of falſe dreames and the like.

Iupiter, in the 10. Houſe or mid-Heaven, ſignifies Princes, publique officers, Chiefe Governours, men alwayes graced with publique honors, and deſirous of praiſe, but luxurious of life; men employed about the affaires of Kings or great men; to ſome he giveth happineſs throughout their whole lives, but commonly he ſignifies felicity, if no evill ſtarre hinder; but if any malevolent ſtarre hinder him whatſoever eſtate honour or dignity is got in Youth, he looſes and conſumes in Age, unleſſe the 7. houſe be fortified with ſome benevolent ſtarre.
Iupiter, in the 10. Houſe by night ſignifies honeſt men, and of good manners, but apt eaſily to be deceived, and ſudden waſters of their eſtates.

If ♃, be in the 11. houſe in a nativity by day he gives much happineſſe, great riches power and government, if the ☉, and ♀, be joyned to him by good Aſpect, but if it be in a nativity by night and the ☽ in ☍ to him, the good is thereby abated, but if ♂, be in the 8. contrary to him, though the native have great riches honour and dignity, he turneth it all to miſery and unhappineſſe.

Iupiter, in the 12. Houſe giveth good fortune, ſignifies the native to be powerful over his enemies and a terror to them; eſpecially if a malevolent ſtarre be in the aſcendant or ♂, in the 7. houſe; but ♂ in the 7. undoubtedly ſignifies a ſudden violent death, and the evills and calamities of the native will be more prevalent and greater if the ☉, and ♄, behold ♃, by an ☍; but if in a nocturnall geniture the ☽ decreaſing oppoſe him, it ſignifies great poverty. But if neither ☉, nor ♄, be in ☍ to him & are in good houſes, nor the ☽ afflict him; theſe who have ♃ ſo poſited, may thrive, by ſome art or myſtery, as Gold-ſmiths or embroyderers of garments with Gold, painters or workers of Silver, but what art ſoever it be, it will be ſought after and praiſed, if ♃ be ſo placed and ♀ joyned with him.

div.head: CHAP. XVII. The ſignification of Mars in the ſignes.
div.p:
IF ♂ be Lord of a nativity he ſignifies, men of proud Spirits, ſubject to no reaſon, immoveable, contentious, and audacious, head-ſtrong, fearing no danger, ſubject to be deceived, great eaters, valiant, high-minded, ignorant, having redhaire, eyes bloud-ſhotten, imperious, alwayes deſiring to rule over others, of a prepoſterous mind, not careing for Wife, Children nor freinds, greedily coveting other mens goods; he ſignifies hurt by fire, and Iron, as cuttings or burnings, falls from high places, or burſtings in the lower parts of the body, he giveth a ſudden or violent death; if he ſeperate from the full ☽, death by theeves, or condemned by the Magiſtrate for ſome offence, but if his malice be kindled by the beames of the ☉, it ſignifies openly deſtruction by burning. But ♂, is more ſtrong if he be
Lord of a birth by day, and be in any Angle, and the full ☽ in any other Angle afflicted by the beames of ☽, or giving her power to ♂. But if in a nativity by night he be in the houſe of ♄, or ♃, or in their tearmes, or in his own houſe or tearmes, or in the 5.11.10. or firſt, and behold the ☽ decreaſing, or the ☽ decreaſing give powerto ♂, or ♃ joyned to him in an Angle by a ▵ he ſignifies Dukes, Captaines, Tyrants, terrible rulers, men of great power, but if be in the 7th. houſe in ♂, as before ſpoken, he denotes the native ſurely to dye a violent death: for alwayes ♂, in the 7th. houſe ſignifies a violent death; but the kind thereof, is to be judged according to the nature and quality of the ſigne,

div.head: CHAP. XVIII. The ſignification of Mars in the 12. Houſes.
div.p: MArs, partilely placed in the aſcendant by night in a maſculine ſigne, maketh Souldiers; By day, without the beames of ♃, he ſignifies bountifull men willing to give more then their eſtates will beare, ſomthing profuſe, but their acts all ballanced with reaſon.

But if by day the aſcendant be the houſe of ♂ and a maſculine ſigne, and ♂ therein; and ♃ with him, or beholding him with a good Aſpect, he ſignifies generalls and cheife Captaines of Armies, Lords of life and death, and terrible to all Cities, or Countryes they approach unto, happy valiant and grave, greatly ſubject to anger, not greatly affecting Wife nor Children.

Mars, in the aſcendant by day ſignifies crafty audacious furious perſons, vagabonds, inſtable, never finiſhing any thing with reaſon, full of revenge, ſpenders of
their eſtate, looſing all the ſubſtance of their lives, and Wives, and Children not reſerving any patrimony for them, and dye young: but if ♃ be in his houſe exaltation or tearmes, and behold him with a △, he mitigates theſe evills every way. But I know and have found in many genitures, when ♂ hath been in the aſcendant, the natives to have beene baniſhed, and have beene good Governours in the Common wealth.

Mars in the 2. Houſe is very unfortunate by day if it be in the morning, he maketh the native to wander from his Fathers houſe and home, and wander up and down in ſtrange Countries, but if the ☽, increaſing be with him or in ☍, or □, to him he ſignifies ſlow feeble perſons, ſubject to receive hurt by Iron, Colds, or fower-footed-beaſts, ſomtimes he maketh Seamen, men ſubject to be Captives or come in bondage through their own wit, but high-minded in their greateſt neceſſities.

But if ♃, he joyned to him by good Aſpect or in his houſe or tearmes, he bringeth the native out of danger, freeth them from Captivity or impriſonment, and reſtores them to liberty. But ſomtimes they
are in want: but ♂, ſo placed by night, ſignifies the native to be a knight or a great ruler, but ſuch as ſomtimes ſhall be ſubject to dangers, though aſſiſted by the beames of ♃, or ♀.

Mars, in the 3. houſe ſignifies the native ſhall attaine to honour with great labour, covetuous of other mens goods, envying all men, and having a wicked conſcience, but if Iupiter, be in the 11. or 7. he ſignifies the native may attaine to an eſtate through great labour in ſome publique Office; if Iupiter be in ♂ with him, he giveth great riches and power exceeding others in nobility, or if he be in the 3. in his own houſe termes or exaltation, and Iupiter joyned to him, he ſignifies Magiſtrates and Governours.

Mars, in the 4th, houſe by night ſignifies common Souldiers, ſuch as live in deſert Countryes, keepers of wild beaſts, ſomtimes waſters or ſpoilers of Countryes, according to the quality of the ſigne, it deſtroyes both life and eſtate of the parents, giveth widdow-hood, ruine, one Child or none, and he that hath one ſhall be hindred by him in all his actions; by day he ſignifies weake, feeble, lame bodies, ſubject to receive hurt by Iron, oppoſed
by women, alwayes ingratefull, but if the ☉, behold him by a □, or ☍, or be in ♂ with him, theſe evills he augmenteth and maketh the native mad or lun atick, if the aſcendant be the houſe of ♂.

Mars, in the 5. houſe by night in his own houſe or in the houſe of Jupiter, or in his tearmes or exaltation, or if Iupiter be with him, or behold him in his own houſe by a △, ſignifies much honour, a great eſtate, much honour and love amongſt great men.

But if ♂, and ♃, be thus poſited and the ☽ apply to ♂, by a fortunate Aſpect, it ſignifies great honour & power to the native, Captaines and Generalls of Armeis, to whom is commited authority over life and death, and great power of the ſword; but if the ☽ behold him not, but Venus be with him or behold him by a △, he ſignifies the native to be rich and happy, purſuing honourable acts; of proper handſome bodies.

But by day, Mars ſignifies the native ſhall ſpend his eſtate, and frequently change his houſe; and becauſe of misfortunes happening to him, he often dies in a ſtrange Country, or undergoes ſome eminent danger.

But if ♃ or ♀ be joyned to him or behold him by a △ or ⚹, they bring great profit to the native by travaile, and recall him ſoone home to his own Country. But if by day the ☽ increaſing be in ☍ to him, let him feare great trouble, or danger of bondage to happen to him: For although he ſeeme to be happy, yet his happineſſe is alwayes ſubject to the power of another; for he ſignifies Councellors to great Judges; accuſations, ſeditions, troubles, loſſe and ſudden dangers; weakneſs in ſome part of the body, ſomtimes madneſſe, burning feavers, which cauſe phrenſies; he alſo ſignifies Jayles, Bondage and impriſonment, unleſſe Jupiter beholding the ☽ in the ☍ to ♂, or ♂ himſelf abate theſe calamities; for Jupiter brings ſudden help, ♂ alſo in this place by day denies Children without the teſtimony of Jupiter.

Mars, in the 6th. houſe ſignifies much ill, brings hurt to Children, gives inequality of life, he gives diſeaſes according to the quality of the ſignes, in crooked ſignes he denotes lamenſes and crooked deformity; and ſignifies all kinds of diſeaſes in this place.

Mars, in the 7th. houſe is very evill, cauſeth great dangers to the native, ſignifies
great labours, homicides, wicked perſons, guilty, Inventors of wickedneſſe, Tormentors, Hang-men, Traytors. But if he behold his own houſe by an ☍, he gives not a violent death for ♂, never deſtroyes his own houſe; but generally ♂, in the 7. by day or night cauſes a violent death, according to the nature of the ſigne; But theſe evills are more violent in ſignes contrary to him for in this Place he gives many griefes and troubles of body, ſomtimes ſudden death or perpetuall impriſonment; in nativities by night he cauſeth trouble to proceed from all their actions oftentimes cauſes wounds by fire or Iron, great ſecret diſeaſes and infirmities of body, eſpecially if he be lord of the time, or partake thereof with the full ☽. But if ♄ be poſited with Mars, or in the mid-heaven, or it be the power of ♄ or if the full ☽ apply to ♂ or ♄, it denotes great evill to the native, and many misfortunes; ſomtimes accuſations, ſomtimes impriſonment, ſomtimes loſſe, great ſentences pronounced againſt him, or he is caſt unto wild-beaſts; caſt down headlong, deſtroyed by domeſtick treachery, killed by theeves, or periſheth by ſhipwrack, but theſe are diſcerned by the quality of the ſignes; for in earthly
ſignes he ſignifies death by wild-beaſts, in ſolid ſignes, deſtruction by ſome fall headlong, in watry ſignes drowning, in humane ſignes to periſh by the ſword: but if the ☉ be in ☍, to him or with him or in any Angle of the geniture, he ſignifies the native to be burned alive, and afflicts him with lamentable miſeries; before the laſt day of his life, he ſhall ſuffer hurt by fire, iron, violence, torments or homicides, ♂, alſo greviouſly afflicts Wives and Children in the 7th. houſe.

Mars in the 8th. houſe, by day, either denies any eſtate, or cauſeth the native miſerably to ſpend what he hath; if he have the ☉ and ☽ in ☍ he cauſeth blindneſſe but if he be alone in this place he ſignifies want penury trouble ſedition and danger, but if the ☽ be in the ſecond, and ♃, in no Aſpect to Mars and behold not the aſcendant, he giveth a violent death, according to the quality of the ſigne, in humane ſignes to be ſlaine by the ſword, by Pirates or theeves, or by his own houſhould, or to be put to death for ſonne crime by the ſentence of the Judge; and to come to ſome publique cruell death, without the teſtimony of Jupiter, or ♀ in earthly ſignes to be ſlayne in ſome deſert place having
firſt undergone great troubles in four-footed ſignes to be drowned in ſome River or Lake, or caſt into the Sea by Pirates: in ſolid ſignes, death by a ſudden fall; in fiery ſignes, burning.
By night, he ſignifies the native to be crafty, and have ſome good office, nevertheleſſe violent or ſudden death.

But if Jupiter, be joyned to him or behold him by any good Aſpect, he mitigates theſe evills, or if ♃ be in the aſcendant or the aſcendant the houſe of Iupiter or ♀, theſe mitigate and abate his malice.

Mars, in the 9th. houſe is good, giveth a happy and honourable life, eſpecially if Jupiter be in the aſcendant; but by night, if Jupiter be in the Horoſcope, he ſignifies Magiſtracy; ſuch as have the power of the ſword, leaders of Armies, but frequently cauſeth ſome dammage in travailes; but if the 9. be the houſe of ☿ or ♀, he ſignifies learned famous Doctors and Orators; but if he be in his own houſe, or in the houſe of Jupiter, or in his exaltation, and Jupiter not in the aſcen dant, it ſignifies the native to be a terr or to evill Spirits, and eaſily to expell them, and command them to depart out of any one, that is poſſeſt with them.

Mars, in the 10th. houſe, by night in his own houſe or the houſe of Jupiter in a maſculine ſigne, or in his exaltation, ſubjecteth the native to great danger, and often is eaſie to be deceived, nevertheleſſe he ſignifies cheife rulers, Captaines, Lords of life and death, Tyrants and terrible Governours in Townes and Countries, but commonly dying an evill death.

Mars, in the 11th, houſe, is very fortunate and good, giveth increaſe of eſtate, and lore amongſt people, giveth ſome dignity or preferment, if the ☽ be with him decreaſing, and Jupiter be old him with a good Aſpect, or be with him or joyned to him by a △, then he ſignifies Judges or ſuch as have the power of the ſword.

Mars, in the 12th. houſe by day, giveth great troubles and evill, ſignifies loſſe by wicked treacherous ſervants, much ſickneſs cares and dangers; but by night, theſe are all mitigated. We ought alwayes to wiſh in all genitures either by day or night that ♂ be in ſome • ood Aſpect, either with ♀ or Jupiter, for they abate his malice; and alſo it is to be deſired that Mars poſſeſſe no Angle of any birth, for Mars, in any Angle of a geniture by day doth divers wayes afflict the native, if by day Mars
poſſeſſe one Angle, ♄ another, and ♃ another, he ſignifies a violent death to the natives or to be ſelfe murderers.

But if by day ♂ be in one Angle, and ♀ in another, he wearies the native with daily evills; either they are killers of their Wives or themſelves; if ♂ poſſeſſe one Angle by day, and ☿ another, he ſignifies fooles and void of reaſon, if by day ♂ poſſeſſe one Angle, and the ☉ another, loſſe and death by fire, if the ☽, violent death, and the mother to dye a cruell death; if he be by day in any Angle without the ☽ or ♂ of any other ſtarre, he ſignifies great ſickneſſe and debility, ♂ likewiſe by day in any Angle or lord of the houſe of Children denies Children: if he be the giver of life by night he gives long life, if in a diurnall geniture he be the giver of life, he kills the native in his youth, but if another Plannet be giver of life, and ♂, behold him by an ☍ or □, he diminiſheth 15. yeares of the natives life, if the ☽ interpoſe between him and ♄ he cauſeth lameneſſe or weakneſſe to ſome part of the body according to the ſignification of the ſigne; if he behold the ☽ increaſing by a □ or ☍, it ſoone kills the native.

div.head: CHAP. XIX. The Suns ſignification in the ſignes.
div.p: IF the ☉ be lord of a geniture and well placed, he ſignifies faithfull perſons, but proud, wiſe, doing all things with moderation, ful of humanity, religious, honourers and lovers of their parents, he ſignifies perſons of corpulent bodies, yellow haire: he denotes husbandmen honeſt perſons gaining an eſtate by vertuous actions, but diſaffected to Wives and Children; of diſeaſes, he ſignifies infirmities about the eyes and other parts of the body frequently happening by fire, and publique or violent death in ſtrange places the ☉ increaſeth the time of life if he be well placed and not impedited by the beame of any malevolent ſtarre.

div.head: CHAP. XK. The ſignification of the Sun in the 12. Houſes.
div.p:
THe ☉ in the Horoſcope hardly gives any brethren, but in a maſculine ſigne or in his own houſe or exaltation or joyned to the benevolent Aſpect of ſome good Plannet, ſheweth great nobility; but if he be joyned to malevolent ſtarres it blemiſheth the eye-ſight, but if ☉ be in the aſcendant by day, he ſignifies Kings and great rulers; but if his power be hindred, Counſellors. But becauſe we have ſaid he giveth great felicity in the firſt houſe, it ought to be explained, for if ♄ be poſited with him by day it ſignifies Kings and Emperours; if ♂ Aſpect the ☉ or be placed with him it ſignifies great envy, danger and trouble to the native to keepe his power: but the ☉ in the aſcendant, and ♃ in any other Angle, and ♂ in the 10, and the ☽ in any other Angle, it denotes great power and dignity to the
native; but if the Sun and Jupiter be ſo poſited, and ♂ in the 10. or 7. and the ☽ with Mars in the 10. or 8, it ſignifies the native, be he King or Emperour, to dye a violent death, or to be impriſoned and depoſed from his honour according to the nature of the ſignes.

But if Saturu be in the 10. he ſignifies potent perſons the ☉ in the aſcendant, and ♃; ♀ and ☿ in the other Angles ſignifies great men of happy perſons, proſperous and abounding in riches, and alwayes free from the burden of Poverty; eſpecially if Saturn behold the ☉ with a △, or ⚹. But if the Sun, Jupiter ♀ ☿ and ♄ be thus & poſited ♂ behold them with a □ or ☍, or otherwiſe be evill placed or joyned to them, he ſignifies great potent perſons having power of life & death, but Theeves Robbers, Tyrants, greedy after other mens eſtates, and at laſt to be baniſhed or ſuffer a violent death.

The ☉ in the aſcendant in a nativity by night ſignifies the native to be a more baſe ſordid perſon, but, if ♄ or ♂ be with the Sun or behold him by a □ or ☍ it ſignifies the native will kill his elder brethren, and deſtroy all his own eſtate and ſubſtance and the Sun in any Angle of a geniture debilitateth
the elder brethren; unleſſe the native be the firſt borne.

The Sun in the 2. houſe ſignifies the native to be carefull in ſeeking an eſtate; and in all their lives good and affable of condition; but languiſhing in their bodyes, and of a ſhort life, and croſſed with many troubles: but if ♀ and ♃ behold the ☉, with any good Aſpect as a △ or ⚹ or be with him; they bring ſome unexpected good to the native, and increaſe of happineſſe, raiſing up men that are dejected and caſt down, to ſome publique office or dignity.

The ☉ in the 3. houſe ſignifies an evill death to the Father, ſignifies the native to be invalid and of no repute, but if ♃ and ☿ be joyned to him by good Aſpect, he ſignifies grave Counſellors, Treaſurers, Rulers and Governours of Cityes and the like, but if he be in the 3. in his own houſe or exaltation, or in the houſe or exaltation of ♃ ♀ or ☿, he ſignifies devout religious perſons, but if ♄ or ♂ be with him, or joyned to him in other ſignes, he ſignifies perjured perfidious perſons, prophane irreligious wicked blaſphemers.

The Sun in the 4. houſe Aſpected by ♄, or Mars ſignifies the death of the Father,
deſtruction of the whole family and eſtate, nevertheleſſe he ſignifies a happy old age, but the native unconſtant in his affection towards his Wife and Children.

Sol, in the 5. houſe ſignifies amiable & honorable perſons eaſily attaining all things they deſire, and beloved of all their friends but if he be ſo placed with ♀, or ſhe behold him with any good Aſpect △ or ⚹, he ſignifies great honour and dignity to the native.
But although malevolent ſtarres be with him or in Aſpect to him, it doth not much hurt the native, becauſe of the naturall goodneſſe of the place, but is only hurtfull to the Children of the native.

The ☉ in the ſixt houſe is hurtfull to the native and giveth great and long ſickneſſe and if ♂ be in the aſcendant, he afflicts the native, with hurt, or ſome wound by Iron; denotes the Father to dye a ſudden evill death, and deſtroyes the natives eſtate. But if any good ſtarre be in the 10. he ſignifies riches great poſſeſſions, and the native happily to enjoy his Fathers eſtate. But although there be no ſtarre in the Medium Coeli, if Jupiter and ♀ be with the ☉ in the 6. houſe, they mollifye and mitigate all evill.

Sol in the 7. houſe is very ill, and gives many infirmities and diſeaſes, eſpecially if ♂ and ♄ behold him with any Aſpect, or be placed with him; he brings much ſickneſs and affliction to the native, according to the malignancy of the afflicting Planner.

But if the ☉ be in the 7, and the ☽ with him, or in the 10. or aſcendant, he ſignifies potent and noble perſons, men in great authority; chiefly if he be in his own houſe or exaltation, or in the houſe of ♃, and have part of fortune in any Angle.

The ☉, in the 8. gives ſudden death to the Father, if ♂, or ♄ be with him or Aſpect him by □ or ☍, he ſignifies dotage, falling evill, Phrenſies and vicious diſeaſes according to the nature of the ſigne.
But if the ☽ be in ☍ to him and the ♂ or ♄ do Aſpect him by □ or ☍, he ſignifies diſeaſes of the head, Lunatick, Ptiſick and Dropſies, according to the nature of the ſigne.

Sol. in the 9. houſe, ſignifies builders of Churches and religious perſons, lovers of Divine Worſhip, makers of hymnes and Divine Songs, and gaining glory thereby; and ſignifies the Father to be of a happy eſtate, and to lead a happy life; but
nevertheleſſe many changes and mutations of life to happen to the native.

The ☉ in the 10. houſe, in a diurnall geniture in his own houſe, or the houſe of ♃, or in his exaltation; ſignifies potent perſons, men in great offices, power and dignity; but if ♂ be in the 7. houſe and the ☽ in any other Angle beholding ♂, let the native be King, Duke, or of what degree ſoever; he ſignifies that he ſhall ſuffer impriſonment. But generally the ☉ in any Angle with ☿, ſignifies learned and devout perſons, Orators and ſtudious of various kinds of learning and curious Arts, the ſame effects ☿ produces, if he be farre from the ☉, free from ♄ and ♂ and ♃ and ☿ behold him by any good Aſpect.

The ☉ in the 11. houſe ſignifies noble perſons, men of a good happy eſtate and condition; living in great credit, and in proceſſe of time increaſe of felicity, and the greater if ♃ or ♀ be with him, or behold him by a △ or ⚹ Aſpect: neither do malevolent ſtarres impedite or hinder the native, but only are obſtructive to the place of Children.

The ☉ in the 12. houſe frequently ſignifies ignoble perſons ſervants and Captives, ſudden death to the Father, and
deſtruction of the eſtate, and great afflictions and diſeaſes to the body: if good ſtarres be with him nevertheleſſe he ſignifies ignoble perſons, but if malevolent ſtarres, be with him; he giveth perpetuall-calamities of body and continuall bondage and ſervitude.

div.head: CHAP. XXI. The ſignification of Venus in the ſignes.
div.p:
VEnus being Lady of a nativity, ſignifies loving amiable cheerefull perſons luxurious, gratefull, honeſt, near, libidinous; godly, juſt ſincere and faithful freinds of uncorrupted freindſhip, of a ſlender handſome body, pleaſant countenance faire eyes, thick haire, a little curling, a beautifull corporature, great drinkers, but little eaters, covetuous of venereous acts; oft entangled in love; honeſt and virtuous in all their actions; lovers of mirth, delighting in muſick, makers of muſicall inſtruments, Painters, if ♀ be placed in the Principall places of the geniture
ture, ſhe ſignifies great fame and honour to the native, ſtudents in ſacred learning. the men great affecters of women, and the women of men, that are thereby ſignified; ſhe ſignifies the native to be fruitfull, and to have many Children, and their Children to be great joy and comfort to them.

But the poſiture and dignity of this ſtarre is diligently to bee noted: for in a nativity by night, if ſhee bee in the firſt 5.10. or 11. or in her own houſe exaltation or Tearmes, or receive power from the ☽ decreaſing or be beheld by ♃, by a △ or the ☽ apply to her without the teſtimony of ♄, ſhe ſignifies Councellors, Treaſurers, and honourable perſons, or if Mars do behold her with a △, ſhe alſo giveth great power and dignity, if ♂ be in his own houſe or in the houſe of ♃, or in his tearmes, or in the tearmes of Jupiter, or in his exaltation, and Venus; be free from the beames of the ☉. But if ♀ be thus placed with ☿, or in his houſe, tearmes, or exaltation; or ☿ in the houſe of ♀, or in her tearmes, and in good houſes or places of the geniture, he ſignifies ſundry changes and varieties of life. But if ♀ be ill poſited, in the houſe or tearmes of ♄ by night
or ♂ by day, ſhe ſignifies unchaſt luſtfull perſons, afflicted with daily calamities and miſchances, receiving great diſgrace by luxurious luſt and unlawfull love; and ſuch as bring to themſelves publique infamy and diſgrace by reaſon of adultery and unlawfull luſts; and for this cauſe to dye a ſhamefull violent death, eſpecially if ♀ be in the 7. and behold Mars with any ill Aſpect.

div.head: CHAP. XXII. The ſignification of Venus in the 12 ſigne.
div.p:
VEnus in the aſcendant in a nativity ſignifies Divines, godly men, beloved of great men, imployed in their affaires good Orators according to the nature and quality of the ſigne; in humane ſignes ſhe ſignifies Preiſts, Preachers, foretellers of things of come; ſhe denotes courteous honeſt men and rich, if ſhe be not impedited by ſome malevolent ſtarre: if ☿ be with her, it ſignifies good muſitians; in
ſixed ſignes, and ſignes of a ſmall voyce ſhe ſignifies great ſtudents, lovers of their Princes; in earthly or watry ſignes, embroyderers or Painters; in four-footed ſignes, noble Heroick Spirits, lovers of Cattle, and a nativity by day ſhe ſignifies infamous libidinous unchaſt perſons.

Venus, in the 2. houſe ſignifies inventers of Curious arts in a nativity by night, but often branded with infamy, but by little and little attaining to a happy condition; gratefull, and free in love •• in this place by day ſhe giveth many croſſes, hinders marriage, and giveth ſudden death to the wife: but if ☉ or ♄ behold her with a □ or ☍ or be with her, ſhe cauſeth barrenneſs and inſufficiency in Venereous acts; the native never marries but is a great lover of Children.
But this influence is more potent, if by day ♀ be in the houſe of ♄ ♂ or ☿ or in their tearmes.
Venus in the 3. houſe is fortunate if well Aſpected by ♃, the native is religious and marries one belonging to the Church.
Venus poſited in the 4. houſe deſtroyes an eſtate, and cauſes Widdow-hood, the native is alwayes uncapable of getting any thing, and if ſhe be joyned with ☿, ſhe ſignifies Adulterers.

But by night in this place ſhe raiſeth in proceſſe of time to credit and honour and ſignifies the native to bebeloved of great men, and to live in good favour and credit, ſhe ſignifies the firſt part of youth to want nothing, but nevertheleſſe the mind to be filled with ſome vices, acording to the quality and ſignification of the ſignes. For in tropick or double ſignes ſhe ſignifies Widdow-hood and loſſe about women; in ſixed ſignes, love and an eſtate by women, ſetting ♒ aſide for ♀ in the 4. in this ſigne with the ☽ or in □ or ☍, to her, cauſed barrennes; and ſuch as care not for marriage.

Venus in the 5th. houſe is fortunate and ſignifies good honeſt perſons, ſuch as eafily attaine to their deſires; if ♃ Aſpect her, ſhe ſignifies famous men and ſuch as attaine to great dignity if ♀ be placed with her, he augments the promotion and preferment of the native, but brings Infamy and dilgrace therewith.
But ſhe ſignifieth the native to be a conquerer in all things, and to receive rewards of victories; foretellers of things to come, great gainers by wives or women.
If ♀ be poſited in the ſixth houſe, whether it be by day or night, ſhe ſignifies ignoble Wives, Widdowes, or weak women, if no ſtar be in the mid-heaven.

if a woman have ♀ poſited in the ſixth houſe of her nativity, it ſignifies ſhe ſhall have hard difficult labour, and undergoe great perill in Child-birth; but a benevolent ſtarre in the 10. cauſeth happineſſe and good fortune.

Venus poſited in the 7th. houſe, in her own ſigne by night, gives a happy old age; but hinders marriage and Children, but brings ſome diſgrace to the native by reaſon of venereous acts, and if ♂ be with her or joyned to her by a □ or ☍, ſhe ſignifies unchaſt laſcivious libidinous perſons and if ♂ and ♀ be ſo poſited, and ♄ behold them by □ or ☍, or be poſited with ♀ it denotes that women that have ♀ ſo poſited to be unchaſt and lſacivious; and theſe vices are the more potent, if theſe ſtarres be conjoyned with ♂ in ♑.

If ♀ be in the 8th, houſe, ſhe hinders marriage, and ſignifies the Wife to be barren and deformed, if the native do marry; but if ☍ be with her, and malevolent ſtarres behold them, by □ or ☍ or be with them it ſignifies deſtruction of your native eſtate; and death by a Gonorthea or Apoplexie.

But Venus in this houſe by night ſignifies riches to the native, and great profit
by the death of women, and denotes a ſudden death, but without terror or torment.

Venus in the 9th. houſe by day ſignifies the native to be much tempted of the Devill, to goe ſordidly without dreſſing his haire, pretending themſelves to be Prophets, and interpreters of dreames, and the more if Saturn be in any Aſpect with Venus.

In a nativity by night ♀ ſignifies religious perſons, devout worſhippers of God, ſtudious of ſacred and religious things; and ſomtimes the natives to be imployed in ſome office about the Church, or in Kings houſes, or about making Ornaments for women, whereby they increaſe their eſtate.
But if ♂ behold ♀ ſo poſited by a □ or ☍ eſpecially if he be angular, he gives to the native many enemies; and his Children to ſuffer cruell death, and that for adultery or whoredome.

But if ♀ be ſo poſited, and ♃ or ☍ behold her with a □ or ♄ by an ☍, and ☍ in □ to him, or ♄ and ♀ with ☍ thus placed ſhe gives barrenneſſe, ſignifies lovers of Children, luſtfull perſons, and by reaſon of ſuch vices given to homicide and ſuch Crimes.

Venus in the 10th. houſe, ſignifies happy men; famous and of great and happy fortunes; if ☍ be with her, Muſitians, ſchollers, artiſts; if ♄ and ♂ be not joyned to her by any Aſpect, ſhe ſignifies Muſitians, and Philoſophers, but if ♄ behold her with any Aſpect, if ſignifies infamy, and men of no power nor repute, but ſuch as commit the tuition of their eſtate to others; if it be a woman that hath ☍, ſo poſited, it ſignifies her to be unchaſt, and expoſe her ſelfe to every luſt, full of whoriſh actions, and to proſtitute her ſelfe to whoreing to maintaine her life.

Venus in the 11th. houſe by night Aſpected by ♂, and ♄, cauſeth barrenneſſe; and hinders marriage: but by degrees increaſeth an eſtate, by the helpe of friends; nevertheleſſe ſhe ſignifies honeſt perſons, and if ſhe receive the ☽ be ♂, ſhe ſignifies wealth and power to the native ſomtiems the cheife ruler of a City.
But if by day ſhe be thus placed with the ☽, it ſignifies power wealth and good fortune to the native, from his youth to the day of his death, and the rather if ☍ be with them, or Aſpect them.

Venus posited in the 12th. houſe by night ſignifies dally trouble and griefe to
a woman, by reaſon of luſt and unlawfull love; if the native be a man ſhe ſignifies him to marry his maide, or ſome common whore, whereby he is without Children, but ♀ in this place by day ſignifies death to the native, through women, according to the nature of the ſignes for this ſtarr hath various inſtuences which are difficult to be found out; for as a Painter by mixture of ſeverall colours brings them to the true form and colour of a perfect body, ſo the Aſpects of the ſtarres and intermixture, one among another alters and changes their natures.

For if ♀ be thus poſited, and ♄ joyned to her, if ſignifies men of perverſe mindes full of vices, and neceſſary for no act, eſpecoally if it be in a nativity by night; but if ♃ behold them with any Aſpect, he abates this malice, and conferres much good to the native, increaſe of his eſtate and free from vice.

If the ☽ be in ☍ to ♀, it ſignifies infanous luſtfull perſons, lovers of Children, given to inceſt whoredome and coveting unlawful beds; or if the ☽ be wth ♀ in ☍, or behold her by a □, it alwayes ſignifies the native to burne with unlawfull luſt, if it be a woman, ſhe is mch given to luſt, promiſcuous love and pleaſures.

But in a nativity by night ♀ poſired in a good ſigne and well Aſpected by ♂, gives increaſe of happineſſe wealth and honour. But by day, if ♂ behold her with any Aſpect, it ſignifies much ill fortune, for ♀ rejoyceth by night if the ☽. ♂ or ☍ be joyned to her, and gives much happineſſe and felicity to the native.

But if ♀ be in this place with the ☉ ſhe ſignifies injuſtice, for ſhe is ill placed here with the ☉; but ſhe rejoyceth here in the morning behind the ☉, and ſignifies good with the good, and increaſe of happineſſe.

But if ſhe be Lady of the aſcendant and of the geniture, and placed in a good ſigne ſhe giveth long life, but if the giver of life oppoſe the Lord of the aſcendant in a nativity, by day, it abates 8. yeares of the age, and affects the native with ſome vices; but ſuch as do not much ſtaine him with infamy.

div.head: CHAP. XXIII. The ſignification of Mercury in the ſignes.
div.p: IF ☿ be Lord of the geniture, he ſignifies witty ingenuous perſons, eaſily learning all things, modeſt ſearchers into the ſecrets of all arts, covetuous of learning; if he be in his own houſe tearmes or exaltation, or in the houſe of Venus, or behold her by a △, he maketh poets, eloquent Orators; in the houſe of the ☽ he ſignifies men of a gracefull ſpeech.

But if ☿ be in the houſe or tearmes of ♄ and ♃ or ♀ behold him with a good Aſpect, or if ♃ be in any Angle, or in the third houſe, he ſignifies the native to be addicted to religion, ſearchers into ſecret magical arts, Mathematicians, Aſtrologers, Religious, faithfully keeping the bond of friendſhip, juſt and honeſt, doing all things with reaſon and counſell.

But if Mars behold him by any Aſpect or apply to him by a □, and if ☿ be in the
3th. houſe in humane ſignes adorned with the teſtimony of ♃, or ♃ in the firſt or 10. he ſignifies advocates, Orators, men of great wit and ingenuity, attaining their deſires by their own power.
But if ♄ be in ☌ with him in a nocturnall geniture, and placed in the beſt places of the geniture, he denotes treachery accuſations and ſtirs up the people with envy.

But if ♄ do ſo behold ☿, and ♂ be in the 7th. houſe, and he receive the light of the ☽ increaſing, it ſignifies the native to be put to death for ſome evill deed, ſacriledge, or falſe money, or the like.

Mercury being lord of the geniture ſignifies a ſmall handſome body, pale faced faire beautifull eyes; moderate eaters and drinkers, ſtudious of all kind of learning; and by reaſon of their eloquence often imployed in ſome embaſſy, loving ſecret learning; he ſignifies maſters of Grammer or Oratory, Phyſitians or Interpreters, carefull in all their buſineſſe, and thereby gaining an eſtate, free from luſt and luxury, walking ſtrictly from the vulger converſation; but if he poſſeſſe any houſe of ſickneſſe or vice, or the threatning raies of malevolent ſtarres; it ſignifies vicious humours, if the ☽ be ill placed
either lunatick, the Cramp or Lameneſſe and death thereby, of by the water.

div.head: CHAP. XXIIII. The ſignification of Mercury in the 12. Houſes.
div.p: MErcury in the aſcendant in a diurnall geniture in ſuch ſignes wherein he rejoces ſignifies Philoſophers, Grammarians and Geometricians, and ſuch as ſtudy celeſtiall ſciences, and are apt hereunto, skillfull in ſaered learning, good orators, advocates; eſpecially if he be in his own ſigne.
But if ☉ ♄ or ♃ behold ☿ in a nativity by day, it ſignifies great men, crowned with religious actions, and oftentimes imployed in the affaires of their Prince.

If ♂ behold ☿ ſo poſited by a □ or ☍, or with him in the aſcendant, he caſts down the native through multiplicity of evills; but if ♂ behold ☿ with a △, he ſignifies proſperous actions to the native.
Mercury placed in the aſcendant by night ſignifies Divines; and men eaſily attaining to whatſoever they ſeeke after, he alſo ſignifies the native to be grave and honeſt according to the nature of the ſigne, ſomtimes the interpreter to a Prince or cheife ruler.
Mercury, in the 2. houſe in the morning ſignifies men ſecretly and obſcurely wicked; without learning; and deſtitute of any helpe to maintaine a livelyhood.
By night or in the evening he ſignifies worſhipfull perſons, men imployed about other mens eſtates. But by day the native is alwayes afflicted with miſery and trouble.

Mercury, poſited in the 3. houſe, ſignifies Preiſts, Architectors, Mathematitians, Inventors of new arts, eaſily applying themſelves to learne any art, if ♃, behold ☿ by △ or ⚹, he ſignifies men of a great wit and underſtanding, good Councellors, and if ♂, Aſpect him ſo poſited with ♃, he gives great honour and power to the native.
In the 4. houſe ☿ ſignifies men of an acute wit, and good learning, and if it be in the morning, Maſters of ſecret Arts.

But if ♂ and ♄ poſſeſſe any other Angle of the geniture, it ſignifies accuſers, keepers of Jayles, and frequent loſſe, but in a nocturnall geniture, he ſignifies workers of Gold, or diggers in mines of Gold, maſters of all ſecret arts: Captains and Governours.

Mercury, in the 5. houſe ſignifies hiders of Gold and treaſure, providently getting an eſtate, keepers of other mens treaſure and goods; he alſo in this houſe ſignifies the native to have many Children.
But by night he ſignifies profuſe ſpenders of their eſtate, or that they are intruſted with; and ſuch as ſeldome keep any money, he ſomtimes alſo ſignifies Geometritians, and Aſtrologers.
Somtimes ☿ placed in this houſe, in ☌, with the ☽ increaſing, afflicts the body with many diſeaſes and infirmities.
Mercury, in the 6th. houſe, brings great fortune to the native, and highly advances him, by reaſon of his faculty in learning, eſpecially if another Planet, be in the 10th. houſe.

By night in this houſe, he ſignifies interpreters, fiſhers, fowlers, ingravers, if there be any other ſtarre in the 10th. houſe.
if he be orientall in a nocturnall geniture and no other ſtarre in the 10th. he ſignifies malignant malicious perſons, authors of evill Counſels, theeves, lyars, having a greedy covertuous deſire, after other mens goods, bearing a bitter hatred to their freinds and neighbours, full of evill actions.

Mercury, in the 7th. houſe in a diurnall geniture, ſignifies the native to be full of vice and wickedneſſe; burning with wicked and unlawfull luſts; ſignifies wives to be whores, according to the nature of the ſigne; if he be in the houſes of ♂ or ♄ he ſignifies Whores, Bauds, and ſuch as are ſordidly wicked,
In the 7th. houſe by night Mercury ſignifies rich Wives, and profit by women, Muſitians, Notaries, Schoole-maſters.

Mercury, in the 8th. houſe Occidentall in a nativity by day, ſignifies ſluggiſh perſons; not willing, nor daring to do any things, fooles, malicious, and good for nothing; but if he be in the houſe or tearmes of ♄ he maketh the native deafe eſpecially if ♄ behold him with any Aſpect, but by night in this place, he ſignifies the native to have ſome eſtate from ſtrangers, and to be finders of ſome hidden treaſure.
Mercury, poſited in the 9th. houſe not Aſpected by any other ſtarre ſignifies contentious perſons, profeſſinng themſelves to know much but maſters of nothing, malitious and acting nothing by reaſon.

But if he be in this place orientall, he ſignifies Preiſts, Divines; South-ſayers, Aſtrologers, Mathematitians, Phyſitians and ſuch as get their livings by ſuch arts, and if any benevolent ſtarre Aſpect him, he gives them good ſucceſſe & great happineſs.
But if malevolent ſtarres behold him or be in □ or ☍ to him, he ſignifies irreligious ſacrilegious perſons, ſpoilers of Churches vagabonds, exiles.

Mercury, in the 10th. houſe, gives to the native ſucceſſe in great and admirable actions, grave, wiſe, and benevolent, faithfull, and imployed for Princes, and great men if ♃ behold him by a △ or ⚹, and it be a nativity by day, or if ♀ behold him with the like ctſpect, by night.

But if ♂ behold ☿ by either □ or ☍, he divers wayes hinders promotion by ſome kind of offence, and hereupon cauſe oftentimes baniſhment, or ſome great dammage and loſſe; and if the ☽ be joyned to ♂, it cauſes a violent death.

If ♄ behold ☿ by □ or ☍, it ſignifies the imployment of the native to be alwaies in watry places, either the Sea, or ſome Pond or River, and alſo cauſes diſeaſes through the abounding of vitious humors.
Mercury, poſited in the 11. houſe ſignifies ingenious perſons, qualified, fit for all manner of actions, and to be intruſted in great offices, if ♃ be in good Aſpect to him.
In the 12th. houſe ☿ alſo ſignifies ingenious perſons, intruſted in great affaires; but ſomtimes they are in danger, whether the event will be proſperous or not.

But becauſe ☿ is good with the good, and bad with the bad, we will explaine his ſignification with every Planet in a geniture, for by day if he be well placed with the ☉ and ♃, he is very fortunate; if with ♂, unfortunate, and cauſes much hurt to the native. But by night he alters his nature, for with ♀ and ☽, he is good; but with the ☉ very evill and unfortunate.

div.head: CHAP. XXV. Of the Conjunction of Mercury with Sol.
div.p: MErcury with the ☉ by day in the aſcendant, ſignifies Kings, Dukes, and great perſons. But by night, ſignifies the Father to be ignoble; they will alſo be good Artiſts, but live private and miſerable, according to the nature and quality of the ſignes.
Mercury, and the Sol in the 2d, houſe gives increaſe of eſtate; and imployment about Princes.
The ☉ and ☿ in the 3d. houſe in ☌, ſignify interpreters of dreames, Phyſitians, Divines, South-ſayers, Inchanters, Aſtrologers, Mathematitians, Fortune-tellers.

In the 4th. houſe ☿ and the ☉ in ☌ ſignifies ignoble perſons; skillfull and ſtudious in hidden and unlawfull arts, but nevertheleſſe honeſt and grave: but the ſigne is deligently to be conſidered, which they are poſited in, and the Lord of that ſigne;
for it is dangerous if they be ſo placed in the houſe of ♄.

the Sun and ☿ in ☌ in the 5th. houſe, ſignifies noble perſons, eaſily bringing to perfection, all things they deſire; but it is dangerous, they never having conſtant felicity; and apt to deceive many.

Mercury, and the ☉, in ☌ in the 6th. houſe, ſignifies poore, ſluggiſh, but laborious perſons, of ignorant parents dull and ſlow in all their actions, unleſſe ſome other ſtarre be in the 10: but if any other ſtarre be in the 10th. houſe, it is a ſigne of riches, ingenuity and honour, eſpecially if a benevolent ſtarre be in the 10th. houſe.
The ☉ and ☿ in ☌ in the 7th, houſe, by day ſignifies great power & riches to the native but nevertheleſſe a violent death.

But by night in this place they are very evil ſignifying perpetual evil to the native, and to ſeeke his nouriſhment by daily labour, and alwayes to be imployed in ſordid actions, and of ſtinking arts & trades.
In the 8th. houſe ☿ and the ☉ in ☌, ſignifies ſeeble diſeaſed perſons, eaſy to be deceived; in this place they ſignify ſudden death, and frequently madneſſe.

Mercury, and the ☉ in the 9th. houſe ſignify exorciſts, and ſuch as cure perſons,
Poſſeſſed with details and evill Spirits, and by ſuch arts gaine the greateſt part of their living.
The ☉ and ☿ in ☌ in the 10. houſe in ſuch ſignes as they rejoyce in or are exahed in, ſignifie great potent and powerfull perſons eſpecially if they have the reſtimony of ♃.
Mercury, and the ☉ in ☌, in the 11th. houſe, in the latter part of ones age give increaſe of eſtate and felicity.
The ☉ and Mercury in Conjunction, in the 12th. houſe, denotes poore unhappy perſons, ſervile flaves and ſuch as alwayes dye in a wandring Condition.

div.head: CHAP. XXVI. Of the Conjunction, of Mercury and Saturn.
div.p: MErcury, and ♄ in ☌ in the aſcendant in a diurnall genitute ſignifies hiders of money, advocates, men well skilled in the law, ſcribes, but of languiſhing bodyes and ſoone dye.
By night in this place they ſignify ſlaves ſervants and Captives; and of freemen to be delivered into ſervitude and bondage to potent men.
If they be in a feminine ſigne, in a nativity by night; they ſignifie Evnuchs or barren men; impotent in copulation, ſordid, filthy, impudent, immodeſt perſons.
In the 2d. houſe ☿ and ♄ by day ſignifies herbariſts and Phyſitians, rich and famous in all their actions, ſomtimes Orators according to the nature of the ſigne.

By night in this place they ſignifie lyars fools, madmen, keepers of Churches, weake in ſome part of their bodyes and full of ſundry vices, often ſubject to be accuſed and put in priſon having no Children.
Mercury, and ♄ in the 3th. houſe ſignifies water-bearers, makers of Ornaments for Funeralls keepers of dead bodys or ſepulchers, Porters.
Saturn, and ☿ in the 4th. houſe ſignifies ſtudents in ſecret and unlawfull arts, and get their living thereby; but ſome that have ♄ and ☿ in the 4th. are oftentimes ſubject to impriſonment.

Saturn and Mercury in ☌ in the 5th houſe cauſe the natives oftentimes to change their houſes and dwellings, ſignifie keepers of Granaries, of Gemmes, Pearls, Aromaticks and mettalls, and revealers of holy things.

Saturn, and ☿ in ☌ in her 6th, and 12. houſes ſignifie in both alike, for by day in either of theſe places they ſignifie knowledg inmany ſiences, ſeeking into ſecret arts and myſteries, deſirous to know all humane things, they are malitious and envious; and often afflicted with vitious diſeaſes.

But in either of theſe houſes by night they ſignifie authors of falſe letters, malitious, wicked malefactors, alwayes, full of miſcheife, but if ♄ and ☿ be in either of theſe houſes by day or night, and ♂ Aſpect them either by □ or ☍, unleſſe the evill be avoyded, he ſignifies men to be puniſhed by death for ſome Criminall offence.
Mercury, and ♄ in ☌ in the 7th, houſe ſignifies heires of women, covetuous of great eſtates, and lovers of women.

If they be in this houſe, by night they denote miſery to the native, all his life and involved in many debts, vitious and feeble of body, malignant and malitious, and ſubject to impriſonment, for ſome accuſation laid againſt them.

Mercury, and ♄ in the 8th. houſe in proceſſe of time, give increaſe of life and ſubſtance, and to ſome, an eſtate by the death of other men, but they ſhall be troubled with ſome diſeaſes about the belly; by night in this place they ſignifie poverty and languiſhing ſickneſſe, if the ☽ decreaſing apply to Saturn, or the full ☽ to Mars.
In the 9th, houſe, ☿ and ♄ ſignifie prophets, makers of ſuperſticious Images and religious ceremonies.

In the 10th. houſe Mercury, and Saturn ſignifie the native to inherit the eſtate of ſtrangers, inventors of great things, writers, actors, or ſomtimes the procurators of great men; if a fortunate ſtarre Aſpect them, they ſignifie men of a divine wit, Orators, Maſters of Oratory or Grammarians, or Maſters thereof.
Mercury, and ♄ in ♂ in the 11th. houſe fignifie the ſame things as they doe in the 5th.
In the 12th. houſe, ☿ and ♄ have the ſame ſignification as in the 6th. houſe is expreſt.

div.head: CHP. XXVII. Of the Conjunction of Mercury aud Jupiter.
div.p: MErcury, in conjunction with ♃ in the 1. houſe ſignifies noble men, virtuous honeſt and honourable, cheife magiſtrates or Governours of Townes and Citties, alwayes delighting in Juſtice and honeſt actions.

Mercury, and ♃ in the 2. houſe in a nativity by day ſignifies the native to have poſſeſſions and an eſtate adopted to him from ſtrangers, and in proceſſe of time great felicity, but in this place by night they ſignifie fooliſh perſons; of no durable felicity, much ſubject to be deceived.

Mercury and ♃ in the 3. houſe ſignifie Magitians, but alwayes lovers of goodneſſe and virtue makers of hymnes, religions perſons and exciters of others to religious exerciſes, keepers of temples, foretellers of things to come, all which are alſo ſignified by theſe Planets in the 9th. houſe.

Merury, and ♃ in ♂ in the 4th. ſignifies ſingers and Organiſts, Curates, Tutors of Children and ſuch as have the tuition of women, and ſomtimes to finde ſome hidden treaſures by chance, whereby they attaine to great happineſſe.

In the 5th, houſe, ☿ and ♃ by day or night do ſignifie the ſame thing: in proceſſe of time they raiſe the native to great power, and make them happy in all their actions, eaſily attaining what they deſire, the ſame ſignification they have in the 11th. houſe.

Mercury, and ♃ in the 6th. houſe by night and day have the ſame ſignification, and are very fortunate, fignifying happineſſe to the native in all his actions, eſpecially if any other ſtarre be in the 10th. houſe, or if the ☽ apply to them, it denotes great riches to the native, and to flow in money, to be Lords of much Gold and great poſſeſſions.

Mercury, and ♃ in the 7th. houſe by night or day, ſignifies gaine and profit from women, publique offices, men of long life a happy old age of good Counſell and good manners, alwayes coveting good things, but if it be in a nativity by night and ♂ behold ☿ and ♃ by a □ or ☍ it diminiſheth their goodneſs.

Mercury, and ♃; in ♂ in the 8th. houſe in a diurnall geniture are but moderatly good; the native ſubſiſting by his own invention, they ſignifie ſome diſgrace to the native: in his youth, but in the latter part of his age increaſe of eſtate.
If they be in this houſe by night, either the native gaines ſomthing himſelf to ſubſiſt well on, or ſome great eſtate is conferred upon him, but they denote a ſickly body.
Mercury, and ♃ in the 9th. houſe have the ſame ſignification as in the third.
In the 10th. houſe ☿ and ♃ ſignifies magiſtrates and men or great power according to the quality of the native.
In the 11th. houſe they have the ſame ſignification as in the 5th.

Mercury, and ♃ in the 12th. houſe in a nativity by night and orientall, ſignifies ſecretaries to Princes States or great men, Notaries; but often offending, ſubject to much unhappineſſe in their youth, or put to a violent death, but in a diurnall geniture, they ſignifie the native not to be ſo much ſubject to offences; and to continue longer in their place or office; if in this place they be Occidentall, the native is more ſlow in his actions, they denote a ſiniſter
unhappy fate, much ſubject to trouble and popular actions.

div.head: CHAP. XXVIII. Of the Conjunction of Mercury and Mars.
div.p: MErcury and ♂ in ♂ in the firſt houſe, are very unfortunate, and Signifie unhappineſſe, to befall the native by unlawfull love; and for ſome evil deed, to be put to a violent death, if it be a diurnall Geniture. But by night he Signifies men of great Offices, Captaines, and ſuch as ſhall have good ſucceſſe in warr.

But if by night ♂ ☿ be ſo poſited and ♄ behould them by a □ or ☍ he Signifies much unhappineſs to the native, ☿ and ♂ in the 2. houſe, by day Signifies vagabonds, fugitives, Captives, and a violent death, if the full ☽ behold them, but in this houſe by night, Signifies men of an evil minde; wicked, malicious, but ſubject to be deceived in all their Actions.
Mercury and ♂ in the 3d. houſe, Signifies foretellers of things to come, ſuchas are much converſant in Implovment about Churches and in proceſs of time, happineſs.

☿ and ♂ in the 4th. houſe, ſignifie men of a poor unfortunate Condition, enemies and treacherous to their parents and freinds, practiſers of unlawfull acts, alwayes by their evil actions involving themſelves into trouble; bringing poverty upon themſelves, and ſubject to great and long ſickneſſe, if the ☽ behold them by a □ or ♂.
But if it be by night, they Signifie the native to come to ſome publique office, as Captaines or Magiſtrates, but to dye a violent death.
Mars and ☿ in the 5th. houſe, Signifies valiant noble men, Conquerers, and invincible in all their actions, publique treaſurers; tyrants and terrible to all their adverſaries.

In the ſixth houſe, ☿ ♂ in a diurnall Geniture, ſignifies great ſickneſs, Impriſonment, the native to ſuffer much by falſe accuſations, and Circumventions of his Servants and ſervile perſons, or to ſuffer falſe Impriſonment for others mens facts;
and to ſuffer great torments, or a violent death, eſpecially if the full ☽ any way beheld them.

But if ♂ and ☿ be thus poſited by night, they ſignifie the native to be much in debt, or ſuffer much by uſury; they denote ſluggiſh and dull perſons in all their actions; and to ſuffer many unjuſt accuſations, by their ſervants and envious perſons.
Sometimes the natives are cruell to their ſervants, afflicting them with over much labour, hunger, and torments.

Mercury and ♂, in the 7th. houſe, in a diurnall Geniture, Signifie the native will kill his wife or ſome other woman by reaſon of ſome unlawfull luſt, and by reaſon thereof to ſuffer Impriſonment and death; but generally ♂ and ☿ ſo poſited ſignifies Homicides, Theeves, Pirates, and ſuch like according to the nature of the ſignes, alwayes purſuing evil actions and to receive a publique ſentence of death; for ſome wicked fact. If they be thus poſited by night they Signifie the native to be involved in trouble by reaſon of ſome unlawfull acts committed with women.

Mercury and ♂ in the 8th. houſe, in a diurnall Geniture, ſignifie the native ſeldome
attaines to what he deſires, ſubject to many dangers, and loſſe of all their eſtates; fooliſh and willfull perſons; often Impriſoned, and dying a violent death.

By night in this houſe, he ſignifies men of evil parts; ſtudious to execute evil offices, and alwayes living by evil acts: it ſignifies Theeves, Robbers, Faith-Breakers, Inventors or Actors of wickedneſs, Tormentors, Hangmen, ſubſiſting by ſuch actions, or oftentimes ſubject to dy a violent death.

Mercury and ♂ in the 9th. houſe, Signifies irreligious unjuſt perjured perſons; of erronious mindes, ſpoilers of Churches, ſacrilegious, eſpecially if they be farr from the Sunbeames, or oppſiote to the Sun, or in his houſe, or if the fulls ☽ behold them by □ or ☍.
Mercury and ♂, in the 10th. houſe ſinnifies weak and miſerable perſons, loving navigation, and watery places; ſometimes ſlaves to Kings and great Men, according to the quality of the ſignes.

But commonly ♂ and ☿, in the 10th houſe, ſignifie the native to be imployed in ſome publique office, but not long to continue in it, by reaſon of ſome falſe accuſation,
to be againſt him, whereby he will loſe his place and eſtate: unleſſe he be friendly aſpected by Jupiter.
Mercury and ♂ and ♀ in the 11th. houſe, ſignifie alwayes the native to dye in fight; lovers of watery places, of weapons, ſound Counſellers; happy in all their actions.

Mercury and ♂, in the 12th. houſe, are very unfortunate, and ſignifies many Calamities to the native, for they who have ♂ and ☿ ſo poſited, are much addicted to falſe-hood and wicked acts, much oppreſſed with debt; ſubject to ſuffer publique ſhame and diſgrace, by reaſon of their perfidious wickedneſſe.

div.head: CHAP. XXIX. Of the Conjunction of Mercury and Venus.
div.p: MErcury and ♀ in the aſcendant in a diurnall Geniture, ſignifies men belonging to the guards of Princes treaſures, or ſuch like Offices: they alſo ſignifie Muſitians, Dancers, making of Muſicall Inſttuments; publique Magiſtrates, Orators, Grammarians, Arithmeticians; by night in the aſcendant, they repreſent men of acute wits, ingenious in all their actions, Prieſts makers of Images, and; in time, to attain to great Dignity; Embaſſadours of Princes, of a gracefull ſpeech and eloquence.

Mercury and ♀ in the 2d. houſe, in a nativity by day, ſignifie men imployed in noble actions, and long to perſevere therein, grate full and courteous in all their lives, but ſubject to luſtfull vices.

If they be orientall in this place, they ſignifie the natives to gaine an eſtate
by their own induſtry, happy learned men, practiſing, learning, and muſick, cherefull honeſt, gracefull perſons: In a nocturnall Geniture, if they they be occidentall in this place they foreſhew great happineſſe, and an increaſe of eſtate.
Mercury and ♀, in the 3th. houſe ſignifie good diſputants in Religion, Prieſts, Prophets, ſuch as have ſome great office or authority in the Church, Embaſſadors of Princes.
In the 4th. houſe ☿ and ♀, ſignifie the native to be skilfull in occult learning, Magitians Philoſophers, alwayes ſtudying celeſtiall ſciences, profitable to all men.
Mercury & ♀, in the 5th. houſe, give great riches in proceſs of time. And great gifts or profit from women or wives, and love amongſt great perſons.
Mercury and ♀ in the 6th. houſe, ſignifie an eſtate by learning, eſpecially if ſome good ſtar be in the 10th. houſe, but they ſeldome marry, but are luſtfull and receive ſome diſgrace thereby.

In a nocturnall Geniture, if they be orientall in this houſe, it ſignifies the native to marry ſome ſervile ſervant, widdow, or harlot, and always to be ſervile
and laborious, and imployed about the the water, if there be no ſtarr in the 10th. houſe.

Mercury and ♀, partilely placed in the 7th. houſe, ſignifie many hidden and occult diſeaſes, in the liver, Phrenſies, Melancholy, and the like, alwayes diſaffected to Marriage, and in famous all their lives.

But by night in this houſe, they ſignifie the native to gain much riches, and an eſtate by wives and women; to obtain to much honour and dignity in their old age: if neither ♂ or ♄ aſpect them but eſpecially ♄; for if ♂ or ♄ behold them by any aſpect, they turn all the good we ſpeak of, to the Contrary.

Mercury and ♀, in the 8th. houſe, ſignifie in a diurnall Geniture, if they be occidentall the native to be gelded, alwayes to be imployed in laborious actions, vitious in body & minde, not marrying, for they will be barren and unfit for generation, and dye either vexed with evil Spirits, of an apoplexy or Phrenſie.
Mercruy and ♀ in the 9th. houſe, fignifies the native to gain his living by ſome Imployment or office belonging to Churches, Prieſts, Aſtrologers, fortune-tellers, Magitians.
In the 10th. houſe ☿ and ♀ poſited, denotes the native to gaine honour from the people by ſome publique imployment, but to receive ſome diſgrace by reaſon of ſome actions of their wives.

But if they be orientall in this place, they ſignifie inventers of Muſick; players of publique comedies; but unhappy in marriage, for they either marry Whores, or publique infamous wives; or they will be given to many vitious luſtfull pleaſures.

In the 11th. houſe ☿ and ♀ ſignifies perſons, exerciſed in imployments about women; truſted with the eſtates of women; and thereby raiſing their own fortunes; but afterwards are againe dejected and caſt down by contrary fortunes.

Mercury & ♀ in the 12th. houſe by day, ſignifie lovers labouring with the vice of luſtfull love, & are perſpicuous and notoriouſly known to all to abound in thoſe vices, & thereby toſuffer great loſſe; and to come to a violent death, through luſtfull vices.
But in this place by night, ☿ and ♀ ſignifie the native to ſuffer much affliction by reaſon of whores or unworthy women, and ſubject often to be deceived in their actions, and of their eſtates.

div.head: CHAP. XXX. The ſignification of the Moon, in the ſignes.
div.p: IF the Moon be Lady of a geniture & well placed, ſhe ſignifies men ſtable, conſtant, honourable, honeſt, of a large faire body, eating much meat, caring for little drink; but the courſe of their lives unequall and ſubject to change and variety, that ſomtimes their eſtate doth increaſe daily, and is againe ſuddenly caſt down and diminiſhed; they delight to live or be converſant about watry places; well affected to their Wives, Children, Fathers and Mothers.

But if any malevolent ſtarres caſt their beames to the ☽, they give to the native ſome infirmity about the eyes, either disfiguring them with ſome wound or hurt thereabouts, or elſe obſcureth the ſight with ſome miſt or cloud before it: it alſo deformeth the beauty of the body with many ſcarres or marks, as leproſie, or ſome malignant wounds; debilitates the whole
body. But theſe things the teſtimony of good ſtarres prevents.

div.head: CHAP. XXXI. Of the Moon in the 12. houſes.
div.p: THe ☽ in the aſcendant in a nocturnall geniture at full, and in thoſe ſignes wherein ſhe rejoyceth, gives great increaſe of fortune, raiſeth the native above his brethren, and to great deſerts in age.

The ☽ in this houſe by day ſignifies, Admirals or cheife Governours of Ships; but if by day the ☽ be in the firſt, and ♂ or ♄ poſſeſſe any other Angle of the geniture; if they behold her by □ or ☍, or be with her, it ſignifies cruell Pyrates, but if the ☽ be ſo poſited with evill Planets and Aſpected of no good Planets, it ſignifies a ſhort time of life to the native.

The ☽ in the 2d. houſe in a nativity by day ſignifies men of famous and perſpicuous actions, but luxurious and much given to voluptuous delights, their imployments to be in ſundry places, and to live in ſubjection to others.

If Saturn be in the aſcendant and the ☽ in this place diminiſhed in light, it ſignifies blindneſſe to the native by reaſon of ſome ſudden hurt or wound in the eyes; if ♂ be in the aſcendant it ſignifies Ruptures, Hemerhoids, and ſuch like infirmities.

The ☽ in the 3d. houſe ſignifies the Mother to be ignoble, ſpotted with ſome kind of infamy; but if ♃ be poſited with her, it ſignifies the native to gaine by being ſome publique Treaſurer: but if ♃ and the ☽ be ſo poſited and ☿ behold them, it ſignifies prelates, chiefe rulers about church Government.
If the ☽ be in this place with ♀ it ſignifies the natives to be dealers in pledges, Aromaticks, wine, or flowers.

If in a nativity by night the ☽ be in this houſe with ♄, it ſignifies lazy ſlothfull perſons in all their actions, attaining to nothing which they deſire, ſpeaking ſacrilegious words againſt religion.
If in a diurnall geniture the ☽ be in this houſe with ♂ and ☿, it ſignifies ſacrilegious perſons, unjuſt, irreligious, wicked Homicides.

The ☽ in the 4th. houſe in a nativity by day ſignifies an ignoble Mother, and her husband to out-live her: but if ♄ be in any
other Angle of the geniture and ♀ in the weſt angle, it brings ſervitude or impriſonment to the mother.
But if by night the ☽ be in this place at full, it ſignifies a Mother rich and noble, and greatly raiſes the natives by daily increaſe of riches.

But if the ☽ be in the 4th. houſe and the ☉ in the aſcendant, the natives receive deſerts of happineſſe, ſome by religion, others by negotiations about women; but by day they ſignifie ignoble, wandring perſons; their whoſe lives full of troubles and dangers; imployed ſomtimes in ſome ſervile office about the Church, eſpecially if any evill ſtarres behold the ☽.
The ☽ in the 5th. houſe by night ſignifies the native to have many Sonnes and joy with them or from them, but in a diurnall geniture ſhe giveth many daughters.

In the 6th. houſe, the ☽ increaſing in light and well aſpected by good Planets, gives profit to the native by four footed beaſts, and health and ſoundneſſe of body; but if beheld by the rayes of evill lanets, ſhe ſignifies miſerable humble ſervile laborious perſons.

The ☽ in the 7th houſe, in a nocturnall geniture in thoſe ſignes wherein ſhe is exalted
or rejoyceth and increaſing in light, well Aſpected by ♃ or ♀ gives a happy old age, profit by women and a happy marriage, but if ſhe be oppreſſed by the malevolent beames of evill Planets, eſpecially in a diurnal geniture and decreaſe in light; ſhe hinders marriage, and when ſhe doth give a wife, ſhe is a widdow, barren or very much deformed and ilfavoured.
The ☽ in the 8th. houſe, gives an eſtate by the dead, and denotes ſudden death to the native without paine or torment; but if ☍ or ♄ do behold her by □ or ☍, ſhe often ſignifies lunaticks.

In the 9th. houſe, the ☽ being placed in a diurnall geniture, ſignifies the native to remaine ſordidly in the Churches, and to pretend to reveale ſomthing to men declared unto them from God; but in a nativity by night ſhe ſignifies divine worſhippers of God, religious perſons, having ſome office about the Church, men of various Cogitations, if ſhe be in the houſe of ☿, Aſtronomers; if of ♀, ſingers; if the houſe of ♂, Armourers, makers of weapons; if the houſe of ♃, devout perſons, well skilled in the law; if of ♄, Chymiſts; if the houſe of the ☉ profit by fourfooted beaſts; if ſhe be in ♋, her own houſe, the native hath
knowledge in all things belonging to the water.

The ☽ in the 10th. houſe, in a nocturnall geniture in a ſigne wherein ſhe is exalted or rejoyceth, and increaſe in light and be well Aſpected by ♃, ſignifies great potent perſons having in their hands the power of life and death, great Counſellors, Dukes, Magiſtrates, happy in all their actions.
But if ♄ be in any other Angle of the geniture, it ſignifies much envy and unhappineſſe to oppreſſe the native.

In a nativity by day, the ☽ in the 10th. houſe ſignifies the native to be ſubject to be deceived in all his actions; but if the ☉ be in the firſt in his own houſe, or exaltation, or in the houſe of ♃ it ſignifies great potent perſons, happy in their actions.
The ☽ in the 11th. houſe, hath the ſame ſignification, as in the fifth houſe is declared.
The ☽ in the 12th. houſe, in a nocturnall geniture, ſignifies long life; but if ♃ or ♀, or either of them, be in the aſcendant, it ſignifies power and happineſſe.

But if ♄ or ♂, in a nocturnall geniture, be in the aſcendant or one of them, and the
Moen in the 12th, it ſignifies many evills misfortunes, and ſickneſſe, both to the native and his Mother.
But if there be no Planet in the aſcendant, and the ☽ in the 12th. houſe in a nativity by day, it ſignifies miſery and deſtruction of the eſtate,
Or if ſhe be alone in this houſe by night, ſhe ſignifies miſerable ſervile laborious men; their bodies having a filthy ſavour, ſubject often to be deceived, and ſuffer loſs by ſtrange Journeys,
The ☽ ſo placed in the place of fortune and apply to ♃, or be with him, fignifies great happineſſe and magiſtracy.
If with ♀, or apply to ♀, denotes much honeſty; if ſhe apply to ☿, •• gnifies men happy, potent, ingenious, cordiall, by learning raiſing themſelves to dignity and increaſe of their eſtate.

If the ☽ be in this place and apply to ♂, it ſignifies miſerable laborious perſons, laboring in fire or about Iron, and getting their living thereby; if ſhe apply to ♄, it ſignifies the native to ſpend both his Fathers, and Mothers eſtate, and to die an eriſt death.

In all genitures the courſe of the ☽ is to be diligently obſerved, not only on the
very day of the birth, but alſo we ought diligently to inquire on the 3. day of the nativity to what ſtarre and by what Aſpect ſhe is joyned, from whom ſhe ſeparates and to whom ſhe applies, whether ſhe increaſe or decreaſe in light, and what malevolent ſtarres behold her; for the 3d. day gives the ſame Judgment in all things as the firſt: which being diligently obſerved and collected together, we can never erre in giving judgment of the fates of men by their nativities.
If the ☽ apply or be carryed to ♄, and increaſe in light, it ſignifies widdow-hood to the mother, deſtruction of the eſtate and much misfortune.

If the ☽ increaſe in light and apply to ♃, or be joyned to him, it ſignifies rich, faithfull, honeſt, happy perſons; if ♂ do not behold her by a □ or ☍; otherwiſe, it ſignifies much miſery and unhappineſſe.

If the ☽ increaſing apply to ♂, or be joyned to him in a nocturnall geniture, it ſignifies crafty, violent, dangerous perſons, often ſubject to be deceived: by day, weake feeble bodies; ſubject to diſeaſes about the eyes and ſtomach, and to dye a violent death.
If the ☽ be carryed to the ☉ or be joyned to him, what part of the ſcheame ſoever it be in, it ſignifies miſerable perſons, in all things unfortunate; afflicted daily with ſickneſſe.

If the ☽ be carryed to ♀, and ♀ partilely receive the beames of the approaching ☽, and if the ☽ increaſing apply her ſelfe to the ♂ of ♀, if ſignifies noble Parents, but the natives to be ſeperated from their affections, and miſerably burdened with want; but they are well known, noble, full of grace and honeſty, and in proces of time gaine increaſe of eſtate.

But if the ☽ decreaſing, apply ſo to ♀, ſhe ſignifies power & happineſſe in youth, but to be ſcandalized with daily reports, unchaſt luſtful and burning in luſt towards women, eſpecially if ♂ behold them with a □, and the evills are the greater if the ☽ and ♀ be in the houſe of ♄ or □, without the teſtimony of ♃.
If the ☽ be joyned to ☿, ſhe ſignifies eloquent orators; eſpecially if ☿ be wel placed in his own ſignes or tearmes, or ♃ behold them with a ▵.
If the ☽ ſeperate from ♄, and apply to ♃, it denotes rich wealthy happy perſons.
The full ☽ ſeperating from ♄ and applying to ♂, ſignifies much ſickneſſe and infirmities, and the native to dye in his youth.
If the ☽ ſeperate from ♄, and apply to the ☉, it is very unfortunate, and ſignifies many calamities, madneſſe lunatick, Dropſies, and the like to happen to the native daily, during his life.

The ☽ ſeperating from ♄ and applying to ♀ ſignifies noble happy rich wealthy perſons, but libidinous, and thereby to ſuffer infamy: if the ☽ decreaſe in light, it denotes the native, to cover unlawfull loves; impure and immodeſt luſts, but nevertheleſſe ſeeking after and gaining an eſtate and riches.

If the ☽ ſeperate from ♄, and apply to ☿ and be increaſing, ſhe ſignifies, obſcure cloſe perſons, guilty of writing unlawfull letters, ſtudying celeſtiall ſciences, liberall arts, good Orators and Phyſitians.
But if the ☽, decreaſe in light, ſhe impedites the ſpeech, or hearing; the body is ſickly, ſubject to the ſpleene, melancholy, Coughs, Dropſies and daily griefes of the Cholick.

If the ☽ ſeperate from ♃ and apply to ♂ in a nocturnall geniture, and be increaſing, it denotes magiſtrates, men in great
power, but holding their power in grea care and danger, and not without ſickneſſe.

The ☽ ſeperating from ♃ and applying to the ☉, deſtroyes all the patrimony of Father and Mother, the native to live from his Parents; exiles, fugitives, ſlaves, Captives; eſpecially if the ☽ be in the houſe of ♄ or♂.

If the ☽ increaſing or at full ſeperate from ♃, and apply to ♀, it ſignifies noble potent powerfull perſons, but to live from their own houſe, ſoone to want their parents, but nevertheleſſe it ſignifies happineſſe in the latter part of their age; honeſt gratefull courteous perſons; and much happineſſe to gaines by their wives.
If the ☽ ſeperate from ♃ and apply to ☿, he ſignifies Judges, Collectors of money interpreters of the law, religious perſons, in all things happy.

If the ☽ ſeperate from ♃ and apply to ♄ and be increaſing or at full, it ſignifies the native to be adopted by a ſtranger; tutors or teachers of Children; to be imployed in moiſt watry places; Saylers, Pilgrims: but if the ☽ be decreaſing, it ſignifies ſervitude, misfortune, captivity, continual ſickneſs & miſery; a miſerable death; if it be a nocturnall geniture, a violent death.
If the ☽ ſeperate from ♂ and apply to the ☉, it ſignifies very great evills, misfortunes, ſhortneſſe of life, infelicity, a violent death, and to dye in a ſtrange Country.

The ☽ ſeperating from ♂ and applying to ♀ at full or increaſing, denotes Adulterous libidinous lecherous perſons, loving and coveting libidinous Venereous acts, and thereby oftentimes involving themſelves into dangers; it ſignifies Jewellers, painters, perfumers, commonly dealers in mettals; and ſomtimes according to the nature of the ſigne, Vintners, Innkeepers, Victuallers.

If the ☽ be decreaſing in light, it ſignifies fortunate happy perſons, ſollicitors about women and getting wealth by them; gaining by their wives eſtate and credit, but ſomtimes ſuffering diſgrace by Venereous acts, alwayes addicted to promiſcuous luſts.

The full ☽ ſeperating from ♂, and applying to ☿ in a nocturnall geniture, ſignifies great perſons, in great publique authority, but wicked, malicious, alwayes coveting to do wickedneſſe: if it be in a nativity by day, and the ☽ at full, it ſignifies them to receive a publique ſentence
of condemnation from the mouth of a Judge; and therefore to be put to a violent death.
If the ☽ ſeperate from ♂ and apply to ♄-it denotes ſluggiſh dull perſons, profitable for nothing; if the ☽ be at full or increaſing, deſtroyers of their eſtate, full of ſundry vices.
But if the ☽ be decreaſing, it denotes hunger, ſickneſſe, Lunaticks, falling ſickneſſe, Hemorhoids, and to dye a violent death.
If the ☽ ſeperate from ♂, and apply to ♃ it ſignifies powerfull rich fortunate perſons: but if ſhe be decreaſing in light, it afflicts the native with ſecret hidden vices, and frequent ſickneſſe.

The ☽ in a diurnall geniture ſeperating from the ☉ and applying to ♀ ſignifies barrennes, hinders marriage, and Children; denotes prepoſterous loves, filthy uncleane luſts; perſons addicted to ſervile ſtudies, and occupied in ſervile actions, ſubſiſting and maintayning themſelvs by their owne endevours, and in proceſſe of time living happily.

But in a nativity by night it ſignifies the native to have many wives, to be gratefull, acceptable, well beloved, living in credit
and getting a great eſtate.
The ☽ ſeperating from the ☉ and applying to ☿ in a diurnall geniture, ſigmfies the native to be full of danger in all his life and actions; of evill manners, ſacrilegious, denying the Divinity.

In a nocturnall geniture, ſignifies publique Notaries, Scriveners, inventers of occult and ſecret writing, or unlawfull letters, finders out of ſecret things; whereby ſome gaine an eſtate, if not hindred by ♄ or ♂.

The ☽ ſeperating from the ☉ in a diurnall geniture, and applying to ♄, deſtroyes an eſtate, divides one from his parents and brings him to want and miſery, but in proceſſe of time gives an eſtate and happineſſe, but by night it ſignifies want; deſtruction of ones eſtate, much ſickneſſe and affliction.

The ☽ ſeperating from the ☉ and applying to ♃ by day, ſignifies a great eſtate, good fortune, and happineſſe beyond meaſure: but in a nocturnall geniture the natives get their eſtate by their own induſtry, are ſubject to daily travails, apt to be deceived in their youth, but in age they live in good credit and gaine good eſtates.

If the ☽ apply from the ☉ to ♂ in a diurnall geniture, it ſignifies ſudden death to the parents and want to the native, commonly the parents dye a violent death, the natives are ſubject to blindneſſe or defects in the ſight, lame, feeble bodyes, they dye young, ſomtimes a violent death; if it be a nocturnall geniture, it ſignifies cruell violent perſons, their imployment to be about fire, Iron or Mettals; ſubject to continuall labour.

The ☽ parting from ♀ and applying to ☿ if ſhe be increaſing or at full, ſignifies ſtewards of noble women, thereby gaining preferment; it denotes alſo Dyers, Jewellers, Armourers, delighters in Muſick, but libidinous; ſubject to daily luſts, but gratefull and amiable in venereous acts, but if the ☽ decreaſe, it ſignifies vitious uncleane perſons, but of various imployments as Orators, makers of images, ingracers, Painters, ſuſteyning the care of others pleaſures and delights.
The ☽ eperating from ♀ and applying to ♄, at full or increaſing in a nocturnall geniture, gives a wife that is a publique common woman or ſome of his kindred.

If it be a diurnall geniture and the ☽ decreaſe, the native is addicted to filthy luſts
and vitious delights, and through libidinous acts getting great diſgrace and infamy, ſervile wandring, filthy perſons, Bauds and keepers of Whore-houſes; if the native be a woman ſhe will be a common Whore.

If it be in a nocturnall geniture, it denotes barren perſons, Eunuchs, He moprodites; if the ☽ ſeperate from ♀ and apply to ♃, it ſignifies Noble men, Cheif Magiſtrates of Citties; grateful, Courous, lovers of women; if the ☽ decreaſe, it ſignifies the natives to gain much by womaen, to live happy from their youth, attaining to poſſeſſions, great gaines, or ſome honorable office in the Church.
The ☽ ſeperating from ♀ and applying to ♂, in a diurnall Geniture at full or increaſing, ſignifies miſery, deſtruction, imptiſonment, or a ſudden death by reaſon of the love of ſome one.
but if in nocturnall Geniture, the ☽ ſo apply to ♂, it ſignifies cruell perſons in great power, but ſubject to daily dangers and miſchances.

If the ☽ be transferred from ☿ to the ☉, it ſeperates the native from his parents by ſome bitter falling out. Whereby he is cruell burdened with want, full of trouble,
but unchaſt and miſerably afflicted with love: but after youth is paſt, in proces of time, he increaſeth his eſtate, and eaſily attaines his deſires.
