If in a diurnall Geniture the ☽ increaſing, ſeperate from ☿ and apply to ♄, it denotes deaſneſſe, flammerers, or ſuch as have ſome impediment in their ſpeech, interpreters, priers into ſecret acts, laylors: but if it be a nativity by night, it ſignifies watermen, or men imployed to labour about the water: but if malevolent ſtarrs afflict them, it denotes impriſonment and ill fortune to the native.
If the ☽ be transferred from ☿ to ♃, it ſignifies great men, Embaſſadours, Treaſurers ſtewards of Noble men, prieſts, rich, happy perſons.

If the ☽ be increaſing, or at full, or apply from ☿ to ♂ in a diurnall Geniture; it ſignifies irreligious, perjured, fallacious, wicked perſons, full of malice, their wickneſſe daily increaſing, Theeves, Robbers, Church-Breakers, Homicides, murderers, and for ſome wicked act, to ſuffer a violent death.

If it be in a Nocturnall Geniture and the ☽ at full or increaſing appyly to ♂, it ſignifies Captaines Governors, of cities,
men in great power, but terrible tyrants, never ſtanding long in their power, but divers wayes offending, and therefore to be depoſed baniſhed or put to a violent death: if the ☽ ſeperate from ☿, and apply to the Sun, it ſignifies men dull in their underſtanding, impedited in their ſpeech, deaf, poor wandring people, having no Conſtant dwelling houſe: but in proceſs of time, theſe evils will be qualified, and after the time of youth is paſt they gain a lively hood by ſundry imployments; if in a Nocturnall Geniture the full ☽ ſeparate from ☿ and ayply to ♀, it ſignifies men imployed in publique actions, getting Credit and honour in all their actions, and increaſe of hapineſſe; it ſignifies orators, men of fluent tongues, poets; gaining by women and womens affaires; Makers of painting Pictures and Colours, Medecines, Iewellers, but living meanly neither abounding nor in want, intemperate in venereous acts, and thereby getting ſome diſgrace.

But if in a nocturnall geniture the ☽ be decreaſing and apply to ♀, it ſignifies rich and wealthy perſons, having the cheife government of ſome Townes or Cities; eſpecially if the ☽ be free from the beames
of the ☉ and ſo likewiſe ♀. But if this ♂ be in the other places of the geniture, it ſignifies men alwaies of honeſt actions and gaining an eſtate by their own: if in a nativity by day the ☽ decreaſing by joyned to ♀, and this ♂ be in the 10th. houſe, it ſignifies religious perſons, builders of Churches, Prelates or men bearing great Offices in the Church; but in any other places of the geniture, this ♂ ſignifies men of meane eſtates; occupied in arts about mettals; or Leather-dreſſers, ſellers of perfumes or ſweete ſpices; poliſhers of precious Jewells, Colourers of Gemms and Jewells, ingravers of Images; builders, Choriſters, ſuch as have knowledge in celeſtiall ſciences; learned in hidden and ſecret arts: and by ſuch meanes, gaining their lively-hood.

div.head: The Signification of the 12 Signes or Houſes in the four Angles of Heaven. CHAP. XXXII. The Signification of the Horoſcope in Aries.
div.p: IF the Horoſcope be found in ♈ the Medium Caeli in ♑ the 7th. houſe in Libra, and the fourth in ♋; we come now generally to explaine what the Horoſcope in ♈, and the other three Angels ſignifies.

The Horoſcope in ♈ for the moſt part ſignifies youth, denyeth any brethren, or only one liveth of many, and he is debilitated by the bitterneſſe of ſome vice, whereby his name is hated: he keepeth not his Fathers eſtate in the ſame ſtate, it was left him; but ſomtimes waſtes and ſpends it, and againe gathers it together: to ſome he will ſeeme free from too much
liberality, and diſpleaſe others with his free liberality; beſtowing benefits upon ungratefull perſons that will never give him thanks; he will be mutable unconſtant, and ſubject to griefes and paines in the head.

If the Medium Caeli be alſo partilely in ♑, he will perſevere to attaine to ſome honorable acts, and flatter with a certaine humility, he will be placed in ſome office, chiefe in ſome learned imployment, maintayning many, procureing eſtates to others; ingenious in many neceſſary things; penetrating into celeſtiall ſecrets if ☿ behold that place or be in that houſe.

The third Angle the 7th. houſe chalengeth, wherein if ♎ be poſited, it ſignifies the native to be a daily ſervant in the houſes of Kings or Princes, or imployed in publique actions, but their lives to be mutable, and of an unequall fortune, infelicity following happineſſe, and misfortune proſperity, caſting them ſuddenly down from the higheſt degree of dignity to the loweſt of humility, envy alwaies fighting againſt their happineſſe; eſpecially if ♃ do not behold the Horoſcope by a ▵ or be not poſited therein, the evils are the ſtronger.

The next Angle is the 4th. houſe. wherein if ♋ be found, and the Horoſcope in ♈, it ſignifies famous happy perſons; if ♃ be in the aſcendant, and behold that place, or be in that place; but ſome of the natives kindred will be adverſaries to him, either becauſe of himſelfe, or of ſome neceſſary thing belonging to him, he will be ſordid and ſlovenly in his haire; but will alwayes have plenty of all neceſſaries, eſpecially if ♃ be found in any Angle.

div.head: CHAP. XXXIII. Of the Horoſcope in Taurus.
div.p:
THe Horoſcope in Taurus alwayes denotes the native to be defatigated with many labours, loſing whatſoever he gets in his youth; but afterwards whatſoever he loſt before, he ſhall cheerefully regaine, and a plentifull increaſe of happineſſe he ſhall ſee his enemyes miſerably caſt down and kept in continuall ſubjection; if the Medium Caeli be in ♒, he ſhall alwayes be in favour and freindſhip amongſt
great men, and his whole life ſhall be converſant in publique actions, and his imployment for the moſt part to be about the water; ſometimes enviouſly accuſed, but he ſhall have increaſe of riches as well as loſſe.

If the 7th. houſe be the ſigne, the native will be prudent in the whole converſation of his life, nouriſhing others by ſome Office of his procuring, burying his firſt wife; and if the native be a woman, ſhe buryeth her husband and a ſonne.

If the 4th. houſe be in Leo, the native gaines an eſtate by his own proper labour and by divers kindes of wyles gaines a great eſtate, but alwayes living happily, but theſe things are to be judged according to the nature of the geniture.

div.head: CHAP. XXXIIII. Of the Horoſcope in Gemini.
div.p: IF the Horoſcope be found in ♊ it ſignifies the native to begin his life with labour; to receive comfort from his parents, bound in freind-ſhip to wicked men; Which gives his patrimony.

If the Medium Caeli be in ♓, it ſignifies the native to live in watry places, and to poſſeſſe his eſtate and patrimony, to gaine his livelihood by other mens endevours, and either to be potent in two Citties, or to divide his patrimony.

If the Weſt Angle be in ♐, he brings ſome damage to himſelfe or his kindred occaſioned by him, and his minde to be troubled with many cares by reaſon of the various changes of the time, he ſhall have many enemies, and be beaten out of his own Country to wander in ſtrange Nations; but afterwards ſhall returne to his own Country, and his eſtate be reſtored unto him.

The 4th, houſe in ♍ ſignifies the firſt part of the natives age; ſhall be wearyed with the continuation of many labours, but in proceſs of time to attaine to many felicities and much happineſſe; but all theſe things are to be conſidered by the poſition or the whole geniture, which we have frequently deſired you, diligently to obſerve.

div.head: CHAP. XXXV. The Horoſcope in Cancer.
div.p: THe Horoſcope in Cancer ſignifies acute ingenious perſons, doing al things with moderation; ſubject to much anger; but the ſame is ſoone mitigated and qualified; they ſubſiſt by publique imployments or offices, uſing much flattery.
If the Horoſcope be in ♋ and ♄ therein, it ſignifies a violent death, or much ſickneſſe, or their own brothers to ſuffer for their vices.

If ♈ be in the 10th. houſe or Medium Caeli, it ſignifies the native to lead his life
amongſt great men, to have his daily ſubſiſtance from other mens eſtates, alwaies ſeeking after and deſiring good things; but his eſtate ſubject to mutability, ſomtimes looſing and as often gaining.

Capricorne in the 7th. houſe denotes the native ſhall be troubled with ſome daily hidden afflictions, but the ſame ſhall be appeaſed after, much diſprofit; he will be ingenious in his actions and underſtanding, but ſuſteyning ſome ſecret griefe, and his minde afflicted with many forrowes.

Libra, in the 4th. bouſe or Imum Caeli, denotes the native ſhall ſuffer many labours; applying to civill women, and converſant in popular imployments, he will waſt the ſubſtance of his patrimony that is left him; he will be in power, and neceſſary to others; well learned and truſted with others ſecrets; attaining to a very old age, and have an honorable buriall.

If Mercury be in the following ſigne, he will be preferred before all his brethren; but if ♀ be in the 2d. houſe, the daughters have moſt preferment, if the Lord of the geniture be well placed, and Aſpected by benevolent ſtarres.

div.head: CHAP. XXXVI. Of the Horoſcope in Leo
div.p: IF the Horoſcope be found in ♌ he that hath this aſcendant ſhall be ſubject to much labour and many dangers, well known, alwayes ingenious, one having free power; not expreſſing his malice in all things, deſirous to live and Rule; and getting the Subſtance of his eſtate by his own endeavours; but if ♂ be partilely placed in the aſcendant, or the ☉ behold him with a □ or ☍, he denies having any Children, but if ♃ be found ſo placed, he gives one daughter.

The Medium Caeli in ♉ ſignifies the native to live in ſome publique imployment or in the Church, to Contract marriage with ſome widdow, whore, ſervile perſon, or old woman or one publiquely infamous he ſhall receive his greateſt honour from ſome potent perſon; he will be Ignorant, but nevertheleſſe ſhall have a proſperous increaſe of fortune.
If ♒ be in the 7th. houſe, it ſignifies his life ſhall be ſubject both to loſſe and gain, he will be gratefull and approved in ſome things.

If ♏ be in the 4th. houſe, he will be the Chief in ſome imployments, but if ☍ do behold this place by any aſpect, he will ſometimes be impriſoned; if ♂ be ſo poſited and orientall, he will be a ſouldier or Commander of an army; but will dye in ſome ſtrange and forraigne place, a Sudden or violent death.

div.head: CHAP. XXXVII. The Horoſcope in Virgo.
div.p:
THe Horoſcope being in ♍, ſignifies many Cares and troubles to the native, he will be skilfull in telling things to come, much ſubject to unlawfull lo • e, Coveting the Society of many women; but he ſhall labour with theſe vices but untill the Anaphora of his ſigne be Compleated. He will he well learned humane, friendly, knowing much and ſeeking into all ſecret learning, of a good memory:
gaining ſome office by his learning, and thereby great increaſe of his eſtate.

The Medium Caeli in ♊, ſignifies an eſtate by publique or religious imployment; in his old age, a devote worſhipper of God, and having ſome government of a City, ſeeking after hidden things but Ignorant of much learning; juſt and upright in the latter part of his age.

If ⚹ be in the 7th. houſe the native ſhall travaile in many ſtrange places, and he known to many men, many will flatter him; he will be gratefull, happy, amiable, acute, full of much Imployment, in all his Converſation Noble.

The 4th. houſe in ♐ ſignifies the native will be happy, receiving an eſtate from his friends, many will flatter him, he will rejoyce in the happineſſe of his Children, but ſhall grieve for the loſſe of ſome of them; he will be apt and fit for all things, learned and happy.

div.head: CHAP. XXXVIII. The Signification of the Horoſcope in Libra.
div.p: LIbra in the aſcendant, ſignifies much ſickneſſe many troubles and dangers, many adverſaries; the native will be religious, a worſhipper of God; but his life much ſubject to mutability, but inconquerable in all things; the later part of his time will be more glorious, but having few Children, of a right & ſincere Judgment in all things, proceeding from a divine and heavenly minde.

Cancer in the 10th. ſignifies he will be ocpucied in ſome famous actions, his old age will be honorable pentifull, rich and happy, having a good eſtate, but few Children. But if ♃, behold this place by any aſpect, he will have a happy off-ſpring.

Aries in the 7th. houſe, ſignifies profit to the Native by the water or watry places; he will be fearefull, he will be in danger of his life in ſome deſert place, ſubject
to dangers and ſudden travailes, having ſome hidden vice; and happineſſe in his old age.

The 4th. houſe in ♑, the natives eſtate ſhall be ſubject to mutability; ſomtimes loſing and againe getting what he loſt, but he ſhall get all his eſtate by his own proper induſtry, and the latter part of his eſtate ſhall be very happy.

div.head: CHAP. XXXIX. The Horoſcope in Scorpio.
div.p: THe Horoſcope in ♏ ſignifies the native to be acute in youth, angry, ſubject to many misfortunes, but afterwards happy, and given much to mirth; if ♃ behold him by any Aſpect, they will be famous, religious, and magnified by their own Studies, alwaies high ſpirited, running into ſome danger by reaſon of their friends or buſineſs, and after many infortunes by the loſs of Children, they ſhall reioyce in an happy Off-ſpring.

Leo in the Mid-heaven, ſignifies the native ſhall be wearied with many labours, and obliged to ſome great perſon for honour or maintenance; he will be valiant, and in proceſs of time flattered by many; and by this means will raiſe many others: he will be placed in ſome authority, and increaſe his eſtate left him by his Father.

Taurus in the weſt Angle, ſignifies the native ſhall be oppreſt with many adverſaries, alwaies covetous of venerous acts, and ſubject to ſome infamy or diſgrace; he ſhall get an eſtate, and loſe it again, and afterwards regain it again.
♒ In the fourth Houſe, ſignifies danger of life by water, and to whomſoever the native ſhall be profitable, they will always be ingrateful to him.

div.head: CHAP. XL. The Horoſcope in Sagittary.
div.p: SAgittary in the Aſcendant, ſignifies the native ſhall have many adverſaries; but an eſtate conferred upon him which he hoped not for: he will be frequently in ſtrange Countries, going much by Sea, in publick employments, converſant on the water, or about watery places, having much Learning, Prudent, Ingenious, and skilful in all Arts.

♍ In the tenth, denotes he ſhall be preferred to great power, the common people ſhall obey him, and many ſhall ſubſiſt by him; but on whomſoever he beſtows any thing, they will alwaies be unthankful unto him.

♊ in the ſeventh, ſignifies the native ſhall have children and nephews in his
old age; he ſhall eaſily overcome all troubles and loſſes, addicted to ſecret learning, ingenuous, juſt and prudent, alwaies overtaking his adverſary with ſubtil diſſimulations, teaching all things, and in proceſs of time, attaining to happineſs.

Piſces in the fourth or Imum Caeli, intimates the native ſhall gain his livelihood about the water, or in watery places; hee will be of good credit, known, and noble, diſaffected to a wife or marriage, unleſs ♃ behold that place by ſome Aſpect, then he eaſily takes a wife, and is well affected to her; but ſhe is a whoriſh or adulterous woman.

div.head: CHAP. XLI. Of the Horoſcope in Capricorn.
div.p: THe Horoſcope in ♑, ſignifies the native will be faithfull in his freind-ſhip to his friends, ſubtill, and wanting nothing that appertaines to the ſuſtenance of his life, he will travaile in ſtrange Countryes and relieve ſtrangers, but they will alwayes be ingratefull to him; he will be amiable, of a little Spirit, a long life, and wealthy; abounding in luſt to women; and contemning & diſpraiſing them when his luſt is ſatisfied; ſtudious to learne hidden ſecrets, either of others lives, or of religion and holy things.

The Mid-Heaven in ♎ denotes the native to be juſt, honeſt, learned, well-ſpoken, performing vowes to God for deliverance from ſome danger or neceſſity: he will have good ſucceſſe in his actions, but afterwards ſome misfortune; yet he will gaine by the misfortune of others, and
have profit by others deaths, and gaines ſome ſecret profit by ſome antient thing.
Cancer in the 7th. ſignifies the native to undergoe much trouble by his freinds or kindred, and to be ſubject to many dangers.

Aries in the 4th. houſe ſignifies the native will fall into many errors, and many disprofits; his life ſubject to change and mutability, ſomtimes in a high degree of dignity, and ſomtimes caſt downe in adverſity; he will have a wife and his firſt ſonne or what ſonne ſoever he hath, ſhall be much debilitated with ſickneſſe.

div.head: CHAP. XLII. Of the Horoſcope in Aquarius.
div.p: A Quary in the aſcendant ſignifies the native ſhall waſt and loſe whatſoever he hath gotten, but ſhall againe gather it together; he will cheriſh and relieve many, but in what ſtate ſoever he is placed he will be in many dangers, deſpaired, of by men, but delivered by the aſiſtance of God; he will be ſmitten by many with the ſtroke of envy, but he will be in ſome religious office, and well known by his good acts to great men.

The Mid-Heaven in ♍ denotes the native will be valiant, but leading a hard life and converſation, removing from place to place, if he be ingenious he will have ſome ſervile office; but the event of all his actions will be proſperous, but about the beginning of his marriage he will ſuffer many misfortunes by his wife or Children, and afterwards much good fortune is conferred upon him.

Leo in the 7th. houſe ſignifieth the native and his wife will live at variance; either he will joyne himſelfe to ſome unworthy woman; or burne in love to many; and many enemies will riſe againſt him with ſome ſudden actions, and by his own power he will take a wife belonging to another man or eſpouſed to another or a widdow.

Taurus in the 4th. houſe ſignifies the native to be great and much converſant amongſt potent perſons; to gaine honour in all his actions, and much eſteemed for his learning, and to live a very old age; if the Lord of the geniture be alſo well poſited.

div.head: CHAP. XLIII. Of the Horoſcope in Piſces.
div.p: THe Horoſcope in ♓, ſignifies ingenious prudent perſons, faithfull friends; but having many enemies, and eaſily vindicating himſelfe from them; inclined to travaile, and negotiations in forraigne Countryes, and in proceſſe of time increaſe of eſtate and felicity.

The Medium-Caeli in ♑ involvs the native into many troubles and dangers; having many great variances with potent perſons, and ſubject to inſnare himſelfe for ſome other man; loſing all his firſt poſſeſſion and eſtate; and againe getting the dominion and poſſeſſion of another mans eſtate, by the meanes of ſome faithfull friend.

Virgo in the 7th. houſe denotes the native to be prudent faithfull and helpfull to others, having many faithfull ſecrets commited to him; raiſing many friends by his helps, but they alwayes prove ingratefull, he will attaine to much riches, and
greatneſſe, and have a loving tender affection towards his wife, but ſhe will ſometimes be ingratefull to him, and he will ſuffer much misfortune by his Wife and Children.

The fourth houſe in ♋ denotes much ſikneſſe and labour to the native, ſecret hidden greifes, but afterwards good fortune; on a ſudden an eſtate ſhall be confered upon him to ſupply all his wants, and in his old age he ſhall dye ſuddenly in a ſtrange Country; but herein the Lord of the geniture is to be obſerved; for ſome will give another Judgment hereof, but this is the ſubſtantiall truth of it.

div.head: CHAP. XLIIII.
div.p: THe aſcendant in the tearmes of Saturn doth ſignifie ſlow dull ſluggiſh perſons ſlow of ſpeech; alienated from all goodneſſe, hated in all their actions, keeping anger long.

If ♄ be in the aſcendant in his tearmes, he denyes the native to have any brothers or ſiſters, or the firſt borne to dye an evill death, or ſome evill fortune to befall them, and the native to have no Children.
If ♃ be in the Horoſcope in the tearms of ♄, it ſignifies ſordid covetuous perſons, alwaies doing ſervile acts, and letting all their eſtate be at the diſpoſing of others.
Mars ſo poſited ſignifies malicious, wicked, cruell perſons giving themſelves over totally to worke wickedneſſe; but their miſcheife is often diſcovered and brought to light.
The ☉ ſo placed denotes men of temperite manners, but alwaies armed with envy, imperfect, and defective in their Counſells.
Venus thus placed ſignifies men ſordidly laſcivious about Venereous acts, and alwayes covetuous of other mens goods.
Mercury in this place, ſignifies men ſordidly wicked in all their actions, oftentimes impriſoned, ſuffering much trouble by reaſon of their wickedneſſe.

The ☽ thus poſited and at full or increaſing, ſignifies men vaine, both in minde and body: but if the ☽ be decreaſing in light, ſhe vitiateth their bodyes with malignant humours; either dropſies, or a deformed pale Colour, or madneſſe.

div.head: CHAP. XLV. Of the Horoſcope in the tearmes of Jupiter.
div.p: THe Horoſcope in the tearmes of ♃ ſignifies wife, vertuous perſons; and if ♃ be poſited there, magnanimous, but full of cruelty.

Saturn or ♂ in thoſe places by night ſignifies perfidious perſons, never keeping their credit or promiſe; wiſe in their own conceits, leading a poore life, full of ſorrow and miſery; but in a diurnall geniture, theſe evills are in ſome ſort mitigated.
Venus thus placed ſignifies men apt to performe all good offices; but never having proſperous ſucceſſe in marriage; they are loving and daily reaping the fruits of felicity.
Mercury poſited here, denotes perſons of good manners, free from malice; ſimply and plainly underſtanding and diſcerning many things.
The ☽ thus placed is very fortunate and gives ſoundneſſe and health of body.
The ☉ in this place, ſignifies the ſame as the ☽ doth.

div.head: CHAP. XLVI. Of the Horoſcope in the tearms of Mars
div.p: THe Horoſcope in the tearmes of ♂ alwayes ſignifies men of an acute quick Spirit; ♄ in this place ſignifies alſo acute Spirits, but long keepers of Anger.
Jupiter in the ſame place alſo ſignifies an acute ſharp wit, but ſuch as are deſirous alwayes to do good to others.

Mars in the Horoſcope in his own tearmes, ſignifies in a diurnall Geniture men addicted to all wickedneſſe, but timerous and ſubject to unfortunare Changes; in a nocturnall Geniture, Cruel irreligious perſons, deſtroyers of other mens goods.

The full ☉ thus placed denotes crafty
ſubtill perſons, but oftentimes inſnared in treachery.
Venus in this place ſignifies luſtfull adulterate perſons.
Mercury in this place ſignifies homicides, ſuch are given to wicked laſcivious and unlawfull luſts, and drunkenneſſe; ingenious, but ſeldom having any true Judgment of any thing.

The ☽ thus poſited, denotes men divers wayes contending with their adverſaries; and their adverſaries doing the like by them, they are very laborious, receiving ſome wound by fire or iron: but if it be a diurnall geniture, and the ☽ at full, it gives a ſtrong body; if a nocturnall geniture, it denotes a ſtrong well compoſed body fit for labour; but covetuous, and alwayes dying a violent death.

div.head: CHAP. XLVII. The Horoſcope in the tearmes of Venus.
div.p: THe Horoſcope in the tearmes of Venus ſignifies lovers of muſick, benevolent perſons, deſirous to be profitable to all men, in a diurnall geniture great dignity profit and good fortune,

Saturn, thus placed in the tearmes of Venus, ſignifies ſcorners of women, haters of marriage, if it be a diurnall geniture; but in a nativity by night it ſignifies ſordid uncleane immodeſt perſons, addicted to unnaturall luſts; not loving naturall coition; mutable in their Counſells, and haters of all goodneſſe.
Jupiter in this place ſignifies, tender delicate but libidinous perſons, luxurious but free from envy and cruelty, mercifull in any office, their imployment to be appertayning to the Church.

Mars, in theſe termes in a diurnal geniture gives ſudden troubles, loſſes many
and ſeditions among the people, whereby he comes into much danger; but ſignifies lovers of muſick and poetry, engravers, or the like.
In a nocturnal geniture, ♂ in the tearmes of ♀, gives a double marriage, and great riches thereby; but withall much carefulneſſe.

The ☉ thus placed, ſignifies the native to Proſper daily in his actions, but diſſertion in marriage and diſprofit thereby, but it gives gaines and love amongſt great men, alwayes favoured and commended by them.
Mercury in the tearmes of ♀, thus poſited in the aſcendant, ſignifies libidinous, wiſe, and of good manners; deſiring to profit others, Grammarians, Aſtrologers, Poets, Orators.

The ☽ thus placed, ſignifies Artificers, delighting in neat honeſt artes; Ingravers; getting commendations by their worke; but in a nocturnall geniture, ſhe ſignifies fiſhermen, or ſuch as get their lively-hoods by ſuch imployments; ſignifies zealous perſons; of a good minde and underſtanding.

div.head: CHAP. XLVIII. Of the Horoſcope in the tearmes of Mercury.
div.p: THe Horoſcope in the tearmes of ☿ ſignifies learned men, credited with offices of truſt, Orators, ſtewards of great men.
If ☿ be therein placed, he ſignifies Aſtrologers, Mathematians; doing vertuous offices, and eſteemed for their knowledge.

Saturn in the tearmes of ☿ ſignifies unhappy cruell perſons, ſlow in their words and actions, great laborers, full of poiſonous malice, long keepers of anger, of an evill report; interpreters of dreames, raſh in their Counſels.

Jupiter in this place ſignifies men skilled in the law, phyſitians, advocates for great perſons, but luſtfull and adulterers; but in a nativity by night he ſignifies the natives to be ſcriveners and of a good report and credit unto the end of their lives.

Mars thus placed in a diurnall geniture ſignifies wicked malicious perſons, contentious,
cruell, raſh, not ruled by reaſon, clamorous, impudent, full of raging prepoſterous fury, hangmen, full of all wickedneſſe; but in a nativity by night, theſe evills are ſomthing qualified.

The ☉ thus placed ſignifies famous Noble men of popular applauſe and fame, interceders or advocates in the defence of the people, whereby they are publiquely known, exerciſing many offices; and if ☿ be thus poſited with the ☉, they do all things with ſound Counſel and reaſon, and are of an uncorrupt iudgment.

Venus in the tearmes of ☿, hath the ſame ſignification as we have declared ☿ to have in the tearmes of ♀; ſhe ſignifies great happy perſons, eaſily attaining their deſires in all things, learned merry perſons, lovers of muſick, Poets, famous for their verſes; gaining eſtates by others miſchances.

The ☽ in the tearmes of ☿ in a diurnall geniture, maketh artificers, ſuch as are preferred for their artificiall works; but in a nocturnal geniture, ſhe denotes ſuch as have knowledge in all arts, all manner of artiſts, delighting in all manner of exerciſes
ingenious, dealing in Merchants and for reign affaires, knowing all things, and for divers cauſes are transferred from one place to another, and ſtriving to hide and diſſemble all grief and infirmities.
